gt:
Mix the turkey and 1/4 cup soup in a large bowl.
Shape the turkey mixture firmly into 4 (1/2-inch thick) burgers.
Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the burgers and cook for 10 minutes or until well browned on both sides.
Pour off any fat.
Add the remaining soup to the skillet and heat to a boil.
Reduce the heat to low.
Cover and cook until the burgers are cooked through.
Top the burgers with the cheese and cook until the cheese is melted.
Top each burger with about 1 tablespoon soup and 2 pieces bacon.
Serve the burgers on the buns with the remaining soup.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground turkey, soup, and seasonings such as salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer. Mix well to ensure the turkey is evenly coated with the seasonings.
3. Form the turkey mixture into four equal-sized patties.
4. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium heat. Cook the patties for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. While the patties are cooking, preheat the oven-toasted buns in the oven.
6. Once the patties are cooked, place them on the preheated buns and add your desired toppings such as sliced Swiss cheese, cooked bacon, and any additional desired condiments.
7. Serve the Herb & Garlic Turkey Burgers immediately.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and satisfying Herb & Garlic Turkey Burger meal.

gt:
Heat olive oil and 1 Tbsp.
butter.
Sauteed chopped onions and garlic until soft
Pour spinich and kale into pan and simmer stirring occasionally.
While simmering add seasonings and 1 Tbsp butter.
I add the lemon juice once it is done but adding the lemon juice is optional.
pred:
[INST]
To prepare Sauteed spinach and kale, follow these steps:
1. Heat a large skillet or pan over medium heat.
2. Add the butter and olive oil to the pan, and let it melt.
3. Add the onion to the pan and sauté until it is soft and translucent.
4. Add the garlic cloves to the pan, and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
5. Add the spinach and kale to the pan, and sauté until they are wilted and tender.
6. Season the spinach and kale with salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and lemon juice.
7. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the flavors are well combined.
8. Serve the Sauteed spinach and kale immediately, or let it cool slightly before serving.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy Sauteed spinach and kale dish!

gt:
Heat shortening in a large skillet over medium high heat.
Saute onion until brown; then add the sugar, salt, flour, dry mustard, chile powder, pepper, vinegar and water.
Mix and cook together until mixture is thick.
Stir in chopped meat, Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce and ketchup.
Heat through, then serve on buns.
pred:
To prepare a delicious Meaty Barbeque Sandwiches dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1/3 cup shortening, 1 pound chopped onion, 2 tablespoons white sugar, salt to taste, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon dry mustard, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, and 1/4 cup distilled white vinegar. Mix well.

2. Add 1 cup water and 1 pound cooked pork meat, finely chopped. Mix well.

3. In a separate bowl, mix 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, and 1 cup ketchup.

4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix well.

5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

6. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.

7. Once the grill is hot, place the pork mixture on a large piece of aluminum foil or a baking sheet.

8. Grill the pork mixture for about 10-15 minutes, or until it is cooked through and slightly charred.

9. While the pork is cooking, prepare the sandwiches by spreading a generous amount of the barbeque sauce on each side of the bread.

10. Once the pork is cooked, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.

11. Slice the cooked pork into thin strips and place them on the bread, along with any desired toppings, such as lettuce, tomatoes, or onions.

12. Serve the Meaty Barbeque Sandwiches immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease a 9 inch square baking pan.
In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, sugar and unsweetened cocoa.
Stir in the oil, vanilla, and 3/4 cup of evaporated milk until well blended.
Spread the mixture evenly into the prepared pan.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
To make the frosting: In a small saucepan, combine the remaining evaporated milk, sweetened cocoa, and butter.
Cook over medium heat until almost boiling, remove from heat and chill until brownies are ready.
When brownies are completely cool, frost with the chilled icing and cut into bars, or frost them individually.
pred:
For the Extra Extra Rich Brownies, you will need:
1 1/8 cups all-purpose flour
3/4 teaspoon baking powder
3/4 teaspoon salt
1 cup white sugar
1 1/2 cups unsweetened cocoa powder
2/3 cup vegetable oil
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
3/4 cup evaporated milk
1/2 cup evaporated milk
1/3 cup sweetened cocoa mix
1 teaspoon butter

To make these Extra Extra Rich Brownies, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add the white sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, and vegetable oil to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
4. Add the vanilla extract and evaporated milk, and mix until smooth.
5. Gradually add the remaining evaporated milk, sweetened cocoa mix, and butter, mixing until well combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
8. Allow the brownies to cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.

These Extra Extra Rich Brownies are a delicious and indulgent treat, perfect for sharing with friends and family.

gt:
In a large pot cook the unpeeled beets until fork-tender (do not overcook) cool and then remove the skins.
Slice into about 1/4-inch thick or cut into cubes.
Pack snuggly into the canning jars (be careful not to bruise).
In a large saucepan combine the sugar, water, vinegar, ground cloves, allspice, cinnamon and whole cloves; bring to a boil and simmer for about 10 minutes (no sugar granules should remain).
Quickly pour over the beets in the jars, leaving 3/4-inch headspace (the liquid should go no further than the shoulder of the jar!
).
Process in a boiling water bath for 12 minutes.
Cool on a rack.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the beets, then cut them into small, even pieces.
3. In a large pot, combine the beets, sugar, water, white vinegar, ground cloves, allspice, and cinnamon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and let it cook for about 30 minutes, or until the beets are tender.
4. Carefully transfer the cooked beets to a large, sterilized jar.
5. In a small saucepan, heat the vinegar until it reaches a boil. Remove from heat and let it cool slightly.
6. Carefully pour the cooled vinegar over the beets in the jar, ensuring that the beets are completely covered.
7. Store the jar in a cool, dark place for about 2 weeks. After this time, the beets will have reached the desired level of pickling.
8. Remove the beets from the jar and store them in the refrigerator.

Enjoy your homemade Pickled Beets!

gt:
Cook sausage and chopped onions in a skillet over medium heat until browned, breaking up sausage as it cooks.
Drain off excess fat; cool slightly.
In medium size bowl combine baking mix and sausage mixture.
Pour in milk and stir with a fork just until evenly moistened.
Turn out on an ungreased baking sheet.
With floured hands, pat into an 8-inch round and cut in eighths with a sharp knife.
Sprinkle instant onion and oregano over the top.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 20 minutes.
Cool 5 minutes and serve warm.
Variation: Add a little grated cheese to baking mix.
pred:
To make a delightful Savory Scones dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the 8 ounces of pork sausage, finely chopped onion, and buttermilk baking mix.
3. Add the milk and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Transfer the dough to a lightly floured surface and roll it out to a thickness of about 1 inch (2.5 cm).
6. Cut the dough into circles using a cookie cutter or a round glass.
7. Place the scones on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the scones in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown on the edges and cooked through.
9. Remove the scones from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

The ingredients used in this dish include pork sausage, onion, buttermilk baking mix, milk, instant onion, and crumbled dried oregano. These ingredients work together to create a delicious and savory scone dish that can be enjoyed with a cup of tea or coffee.

gt:
Spread peanut butter over each tortilla.
Warm in the microwave for 10-15 seconds(optional).
Sprinkle with chopped apple and granola.
Roll up tortillas and cut in half.
Enjoy.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread a layer of peanut butter evenly on each tortilla, leaving a small border around the edges.
3. Add a layer of chopped granny smith apple on top of the peanut butter.
4. Sprinkle the oats & honey granola cereal on top of the apple.
5. Roll up the tortillas, starting from the edge with the peanut butter, to encase the filling.
6. Place the rolled tortillas on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the tortillas are crispy and the filling is warm.
7. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Crunchy Peanut Butter Wraps!

gt:
Preheat oven to 375 F.
Combine thawed potatoes, cheddar, mushroom soup, sour cream and onion in a large bowl and stir until combined.
Add melted butter and stir until everything is moist.
Add your salt and pepper to taste.
Spread into a 13 x 9 baking dish and bake for 1 hour.
pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the thawed hash browns, shredded cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, and minced onion. Mix well.
3. Grease a baking dish with melted butter.
4. Pour the hash brown mixture into the prepared baking dish.
5. Season the mixture with salt and pepper, to taste.
6. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the hash browns are cooked through.
7. Serve the Cheesy Party Potatoes immediately.

Enjoy your delicious and savory Cheesy Party Potatoes dish!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Line bottom and sides of a 13 x 9-inch pan with heavy-duty aluminum foil, allowing 2 inches to extend over sides; lightly grease foil.
Stir together 1 3/4 cups flour and 1/2 cup sugar.
Cut in butter with a pastry blender or fork until crumbly.
Press mixture onto bottom of prepared pan.
Bake at 350F for 20 to 23 minutes or until lightly browned.
Meanwhile, whisk eggs in a medium bowl until smooth; whisk in coconut, lime zest and juice and tequila and remaining 1 1/2 cups sugar.
Stir together baking powder, salt and remaining 1/4 cup flour; whisk into egg mixture.
Pour over hot crust.
Bake at 350F for 25 minutes or until filling is set.
Let cool 1 hour on a wire rack.
Lift from pan, using foil sides as handles,.
Remove foil, and cut into bars,
Garnish, if desired.
pred:
[INST]To prepare Tequila-Lime-Coconut Macaroon Bars, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and baking powder.
3. Cut the cold butter into small pieces and add it to the dry ingredients. Using your hands or a pastry cutter, mix the butter into the flour mixture until it resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and lime zest until well combined.
5. Add the egg mixture to the flour mixture, stirring until the dough comes together.
6. Fold in the sweetened flaked coconut and tequila.
7. Pour the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the bars for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden and the center is set.
9. Remove the bars from the oven and let them cool completely on a wire rack.
10. Once the bars are completely cooled, dust them with powdered sugar and garnish with lime rind curls.

Enjoy your Tequila-Lime-Coconut Macaroon Bars!

gt:
This is the powdered kanten I used.
You dissolve each pack in 400 ml water.
I used half of this - but use whatever brand you're familiar with.
Work over a bowl since you'll be using both the orange pulp and juice.
Peel the orange and slide a knife into the cluster to remove the flesh.
Transfer the meat into the cups.
Remove seeds.
I used 100 ml of juice.
Add 100 ml of water and 1/2 packet of kanten (eye-balled) to dissolve.
Heat, and add sugar.
When the mixture boils and the sugar is fully dissolved, add orange juice.
Pour into the cups.
Chill to finish.
pred:
To make a delicious Orange Jelly with Lots of Orange Pulp dish, follow these steps:

1. Wash and peel the three large oranges.
2. Cut the oranges into small pieces and remove the seeds.
3. In a large pot, combine the oranges, Kanten (agar-agar), and sugar.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring occasionally.
5. Reduce the heat and let the mixture simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the Kanten has fully dissolved and the mixture has thickened.
6. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool slightly.
7. Using a spoon, carefully scoop out the orange pulp and transfer it to a blender or food processor.
8. Blend the orange pulp until smooth and creamy.
9. Pour the blended orange mixture back into the pot.
10. Return the pot to the heat and let the mixture simmer for another 5-10 minutes, or until it reaches the desired consistency.
11. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool completely.
12. Once the mixture has cooled, transfer it to an airtight container and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
13. After refrigeration, the jelly will have set and will be ready to serve.

This delicious Orange Jelly with Lots of Orange Pulp dish is a refreshing and healthy dessert or snack option that can be enjoyed on its own or paired with other dishes.

gt:
Cook and drain fettuccine as directed on package.
Cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, in 10-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Cook onion and garlic in oil, stirring occasionally, until onion is crisp-tender.
Stir in remaining ingredients except fettuccine; reduce heat to medium.
Cover; cook about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft.
Serve over fettuccine.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook until it is browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a large pot, bring the chicken broth to a boil. Add the tomatoes and cook until they are soft and the liquid has reduced by half, about 10-12 minutes.
7. Add the cooked chicken back to the pot and stir to combine.
8. Add the uncooked fettuccine to the pot, stirring to coat the pasta with the sauce. Cook the pasta until it is al dente, about 8-10 minutes.
9. Stir in the fresh basil or dried basil leaves, salt, and red pepper sauce. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the flavors are well combined.
10. Serve the Tomato-Basil Chicken and fettuccine over a bed of cooked pasta.

[/INST]

gt:
Clean the chicken well and cut into cubes.
Marinate it in a bowl alongwith soya sauce, baking soda, cornflour, salt, chilli powder and lemon juice.
Add eggs and mix well.
Allow to marinate for 2-3 hours.
Heat oil in a wok.
Fry the marinated chicken cubes in it.
Drain excess oil on clean kitchen paper napkins.
In a pan, heat 1 tbsp.
of oil on medium flame.
Add curry leaves and green chillies.
Stir-fry for a minute.
Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for 5 minutes on medium flame.
Stir in the yoghurt.
Add the fried chicken and mix well.
Cook on slow flame for 15 minutes.
Serve hot.
pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To create a delicious Chinese Chicken Chilli dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large bowl, combine the boneless chicken pieces, beaten eggs, soya sauce, baking soda, cornflour, and yogurt. Mix well.
3. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the ginger-garlic paste and cook for a few seconds.
4. Add the chicken mixture to the skillet or wok, stirring occasionally to ensure even cooking. Cook for about 10-12 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
5. Add the green chilies and curry leaves to the skillet or wok, stirring to combine. Cook for another 2-3 minutes or until the chilies are slightly softened.
6. Remove the skillet or wok from the heat and transfer the chicken mixture to a large baking dish.
7. Bake the chicken mixture in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly crispy.
8. Serve the Chinese Chicken Chilli hot, garnished with fresh cilantro or green onions, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Chinese Chicken Chilli dish!

gt:
1.
Mix all the ingredients together from grated cheese to chilli flakes to create the stuffing.
2.
Put the stuffing in a cling film and roll it tightly in the shape of a rectangle.
3.
Refrigerate till further use.
pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 6 nos. processed cheese cubes
- 1 tbsp green capsicum finely chopped
- 1 no. spring onion with greens finely chopped
- 1/4 tsp red chilli flakes
- 1/4 tsp pepper powder
- 1 cup refined flour
- 1/8 tsp salt
- 1/2 tsp oil
- 1/2 cup water approximately

2. Prepare the filling:
- In a bowl, mix the processed cheese cubes, green capsicum, spring onion, red chilli flakes, and pepper powder.
- Add water to the mixture, stirring gently to combine all the ingredients.

3. Prepare the dough:
- In a separate bowl, mix the refined flour, salt, and oil.
- Gradually add the water to the flour mixture, stirring until a smooth dough forms.

4. Roll out the dough:
- On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough into thin, even sheets.
- Cut the dough into small, even squares.

5. Fill and fold the dough:
- Place a small amount of the cheese filling on the center of each dough square.
- Fold the dough over the filling, pressing the edges together to seal the filling inside.
- Deep fry the spring rolls in hot oil until golden brown.

6. Serve:
- Once the spring rolls are cooked, remove them from the oil and drain on paper towels.
- Serve the Cheesy Spring Rolls warm, with dipping sauce if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Place frozen chicken tenders in crock pot.
Mix italian dressing with cream of chicken soup.
Put soup mix on top of chicken.
Put cream cheese block on top -- do not stir!
Cook on low 6-8 hours.
When cream cheese gets soft enough then stir it into soup mixture.
Serve over noodles.
pred:
To make a delicious Easiest Crock Pot Chicken Alfredo dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the chicken tenders until they are fully cooked through. Remove from heat and set aside.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Italian salad dressing mix, chicken broth, and cream of chicken soup. Whisk until smooth.
4. In a separate bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth.
5. Add the cooked chicken tenders to the cream cheese mixture and stir until well combined.
6. Pour the chicken and cream cheese mixture into a large, oven-safe crock pot.
7. Cook the dish on low heat for about 4-6 hours, or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the sauce is creamy and smooth.
8. Serve the Easiest Crock Pot Chicken Alfredo over your choice of pasta, such as spaghetti or fettuccine.

This delicious dish is perfect for a cozy night in or a gathering with friends and family. The combination of chicken, cream cheese, and creamy Alfredo sauce creates a rich and satisfying meal that everyone will enjoy.

gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Prepare brownie batter as directed on package; spread into greased 13x9-inch pan.
Beat cream cheese with mixer until creamy.
Add sugar, egg and vanilla; mix well.
Drop by tablespoonfuls over brownie batter; swirl with knife.
Bake 35 to 40 min.
or until cream cheese mixture is lightly browned.
Cool completely before cutting to serve.
Keep refrigerated.
pred:
To make a delicious PHILADELPHIA Marble Brownies dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the brownie mix, softened cream cheese, sugar, and egg. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the vanilla extract and mix until smooth.
4. Spread the batter evenly into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the brownies to cool completely in the pan.
7. Once cooled, cut the brownies into desired sizes and serve.

The ingredients for this delicious dish include a brownie mix, softened cream cheese, sugar, egg, and vanilla extract. By following the instructions, you can create a delightful and indulgent dessert.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
Butter pan.
Peel bananas and mash with fork in a small bowl.
In a different bowl mix the sugar, oil, and egg until creamy yellow.
Blend in the mashed bananas and add nuts if wanted.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt.
Destroy any lumps.
Put the batter into a loaf pan and bake for 1 hour or until tooth pick comes out clean.
Enjoy!
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, ripe bananas, and mashed bananas.
3. Add the flour, salt, egg, oil, and baking soda to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the chopped walnuts, if using.
5. Grease a loaf pan with butter, and pour the batter into it.
6. Bake the banana bread for about 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
7. Remove the banana bread from the oven, and let it cool in the pan for about 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

In summary, the steps involved in cooking Banana Bread with these ingredients include preheating the oven, combining the ingredients, mixing them, adding the walnuts, greasing the loaf pan, baking the bread, and allowing it to cool. The result is a delicious and moist Banana Bread that can be enjoyed with a cup of coffee or tea.

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Mix the 2 c. flour, 4 Tbsp.
sugar, 1/2 tsp.
salt and 1 c. melted butter, together.
Pat in the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan.
Mix sliced apples, 1 c. sugar and 1 tsp.
cinnamon, together, and spread over crust layer.
Mix the last 1 c. flour, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp.
salt and the softened butter together until crumbly.
Sprinkle on top of apple layer.
Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes until golden and bubbly.
Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream.
(We love cinnamon ice cream with this.)
Enjoy!
pred:
To create a delicious Apple Kuchen, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and salt. Cut in the softened butter using a pastry cutter or your fingers until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
3. Press the crust mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
4. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and lightly golden. Remove from the oven and let it cool.
5. While the crust is baking, prepare the filling by combining the sliced apples, sugar, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt in a large mixing bowl.
6. Once the crust is cooled, pour the apple mixture evenly over the crust.
7. For the topping, combine the flour, sugar, and salt in a small mixing bowl. Cut in the softened butter using a pastry cutter or your fingers until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
8. Sprinkle the topping evenly over the apple mixture.
9. Bake the Apple Kuchen in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
10. Remove the Apple Kuchen from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Apple Kuchen!

gt:
Cut beef into 1 inch squares.
Brown chopped onion in butter; add paprika and fry slightly; do not brown paprika.
Add cubed beef, salt and pepper; simmer until tender in its own juices, being careful not to scorch.
Add carrots and water and simmer until carrots are partly cooked.
Add potatoes; cook until potatoes are done, for about 1 hour.
Serve with dumplings if desired.
pred:
To cook a delightful Hungarian Goulash Soup, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the butter over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the paprika, salt, and pepper, stirring to combine.
5. Pour in the water and bring to a boil.
6. Add the carrots, potatoes, and caraway seeds.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 1.5 to 2 hours, or until the vegetables are tender.
8. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
9. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

This delicious Hungarian Goulash Soup is a hearty and flavorful dish that combines tender beef, vegetables, and a rich, spicy sauce. The combination of ingredients creates a satisfying and comforting meal that is perfect for a cold winter's day.

gt:
Cream the shortening and sugar.
Add the molasses, egg, and salt and mix well.
Add the flour, soda, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves; mix well.
This makes a stiff dough.
Roll into balls and roll in granulated sugar.
Bake on ungreased sheet at 350 degrees for 12 minutes (do not flatten balls on sheet).
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the shortening and sugar until fluffy.
3. Add the molasses, egg, and salt, and mix well.
4. Gradually add the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, ginger, and clove, mixing until a soft dough forms.
5. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
7. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies for 8-10 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Gingersnaps!

gt:
1.
Mix all ingredients together in large bowl.
2.
Place in greased 9x13 glass dish.
3.
Bake at 350 for an hour or until center is bubbly and top is slightly brown.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the hash browns, cheese, and onion.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the soup, bacon bits, and melted butter.
4. Pour the soup mixture over the hash brown mixture and stir to combine.
5. Add the sour cream and mix well.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the casserole is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve and enjoy!

[/INST]

gt:
In a 4 to 6 quart Dutch oven or stockpot, sautee the chopped vegetables in one to two tablespoon of olive oil on medium-high heat.
Youll need to stir the ingredients every few minutes so they can cook evenly.
Once the onions start turning translucent, turn the heat down to medium-low.
Add all of the spices and canned ingredients, and stir.
Cover for about two hours, stirring occasionally.
By the time your chili is done, the sweet potatoes should be nice and soft and the liquid should have reduced a bit, producing the hearty chili consistency that we all know and love.
To garnish your bowl of chili, try adding a dollop of sour cream, chopped green onions, fresh cilantro, avocado and grated cheese.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat. Add the onion, green pepper, and red pepper, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the sweet potato, garlic, chili powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, cocoa powder, cinnamon, salt, and pepper. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and the spices are fragrant.
4. Add the canned diced tomatoes, broth, and black beans. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30-45 minutes, or until the sweet potato is tender and the chili has thickened.
5. Serve the Sweet Potato Black Bean Chili hot, garnished with chopped cilantro, if desired. Enjoy!

gt:
Combine dressing, garlic and red pepper in a 2 cup glass measure or medium glass bowl.
Place chicken in large glass bowl, pour dressing over chicken, cover and marinate at least 30 minutes, but overnight is fine.
Remove chicken from marinade, drain well, discard marinade.
Heat oil in large skillet over medium high heat until hot.
Add chicken, cook 5-7 minutes, stirring until chicken is slightly brown, spooning off any excess liquid.
Add bell peppers, onion, oregano, pepper, and cumin.
Cook, stirring, 4-5 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Add rice, black beans and tomatoes.
Cook 2-3 minutes more or until thoroughly heated.
Garnish with cilantro, serve immediately.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the fat-free Italian salad dressing, minced garlic, ground red pepper, ground black pepper, ground cumin, and oregano.
2. Add the chicken strips to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the dressing mixture.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until it is browned on all sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet or wok, add the bell peppers and onion. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the cooked rice to the skillet or wok and stir to combine with the vegetables.
7. Add the black beans (or cooked black beans) and diced tomatoes to the skillet or wok, stirring to combine.
8. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet or wok and stir to combine with the rice mixture.
9. Serve the Spicy Cuban Chicken and rice mixture over a bed of cooked rice.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
In a large pot, combine minced garlic, olive oil, and chopped vegetables.
Stir to combine and cook over medium-high heat until the vegetables start to soften, about 68 minutes.
Stir in vegetable broth, water, parsley and a few pinches of salt and pepper.
Bring soup to a boil, then cover pot partially and simmer on medium heat until the vegetables are fork-tender, about 20 minutes.
Taste the soup and add a few more pinches of salt, if needed.
Stir in the cooked garbanzo beans and quinoa, and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve, and enjoy!
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the cubed squash, sweet potatoes, and carrots with olive oil, salt, pepper, and minced garlic. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
3. Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
4. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the vegetable broth over medium heat.
5. Add the cooked vegetables to the pot, and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to low, and let the soup simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
7. Add the cooked garbanzo beans and quinoa to the pot, and stir to combine.
8. Simmer the soup for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the quinoa is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.
9. Remove the soup from the heat, and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Stir in the minced garlic, dried parsley, and salt and pepper to taste.
11. Serve the delicious Winter Vegetable Soup hot, garnished with a drizzle of olive oil and a sprinkle of fresh parsley, if desired.

Enjoy your homemade Winter Vegetable Soup!

gt:
Whip cream until soft peaks form
Add lemon curd, confectioner's sugar, vanilla and drops of yellow food coloring, beat until just firm
Use this to top and fill cakes, cupcakes,pies, brownies, bars,cookies anywhere a lemon whipped cream would taste good!
pred:
1. Begin by preparing the whipped cream by placing the cold heavy whipping cream in a large mixing bowl.
2. Using a hand mixer or electric mixer, whip the cream until it reaches the desired consistency, which is usually soft peaks.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the Lemon curd and confectioner's sugar until well combined.
4. Carefully fold the Lemon curd mixture into the whipped cream until fully incorporated.
5. Add the vanilla extract to the mixture and gently fold it in.
6. Transfer the mixture to a piping bag or a large plastic bag with a small hole cut in the corner.
7. Pipe the whipped cream mixture onto the desired dessert or use the bag to pipe it onto the desired dessert.
8. Serve immediately and enjoy the delicious Lemon Whipped Cream dish.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Place 4 cupcake liners along the outside corners of a muffin tin.
In a medium bowl, beat the oil, sugar and salt together with an electric mixer for at least 4 minutes, until the mixture is light and fluffy.
Add the egg, coconut milk, vanilla and almond extracts and beat another 15 seconds.
Add the flour, baking powder and baking soda on top of the mixture and beat just until combined.
Do not overmix.
Finally, stir in the flaked coconut.
Divide the batter between the cupcake liners (it will come almost to the top).
Bake for 23-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.
Once the cupcakes have completely cooled, beat together all frosting ingredients (except coconut) and frost cupcakes.
Toast the coconut in a small skillet over medium heat, stirring constantly.
Remove when it turns golden brown and use to garnish the cupcakes.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened cream cheese and butter until smooth.
3. Add the sugar and vanilla extract, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and almond extract.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the unsweetened coconut milk, and mix until just combined.
7. Fold in the sweetened flaked coconut.
8. Divide the batter evenly between two greased cupcake liners.
9. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cupcakes to cool completely before frosting.

To make the frosting:
1. In a large mixing bowl, beat the unsweetened coconut milk, almond extract, and powdered sugar until smooth and creamy.
2. Spread the frosting evenly over the cooled cupcakes.
3. Sprinkle the remaining sweetened flaked coconut on top of the frosting.
4. Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
in olive oil, saute onion and garlic until softened.
add mushrooms, cook until browning.
add barley and cook for 5 minutes until lightly toasted.
add white wine, add 3 c stock, tomato, salt& pepper.
bring to boil, cover and simmer 25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
add peas and some additional broth if needed, simmer an additional 10-15 minutes stir in cheese, and more salt& pepper if needed.
pred:
[/SYS]

[SYS]
To create a mouthwatering barley risotto dish, follow these steps:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and onion, sautéing until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the sliced mushrooms and continue sautéing until they are tender.
4. Add the barley to the saucepan and stir to coat it with the oil and onion mixture.
5. Pour in the white wine, and let it cook until it has been absorbed by the barley.
6. Add the vegetable stock, one cup at a time, stirring constantly to ensure the barley is cooked evenly.
7. Add the fresh diced tomato and peas, and continue stirring until the barley is cooked through and the liquid has been absorbed.
8. Season the risotto with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Grate the romano cheese over the top of the risotto, and stir it in.
10. Serve the barley risotto immediately, and enjoy the delicious, comforting meal.

[/SYS]

gt:
Cut chicken into bite sized pieces
Heat butter in 2 pans add green beans in one add chicken in the other.
To the chicken add parsley, cilantro, marjoram, garlic and salt.
Simmer for 15 minutes stirring occasionally.
To the green beans add the salt, garlic, and onion powder.
Let simmer 15 minutes if you use canned don't simmer at all.
Add the coconut milk to green beans.
Then add lime zest, and juice.
Simmer 5 minutes add honey.
Simmer 10 minutes
Add green beans and sauce to chicken.
Simmer till liquid has reduced to almost nothing if using canned beans add now.
Let sit 5 minutes serve I hope you enjoy!
pred:
[INST]To create a delicious Chicken green beans with lime in the coconut dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until they are browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the cilantro, parsley, marjoram, salt, and granulated garlic powder. Cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the coconut milk, lime zest, and lime juice to the skillet. Stir to combine.
5. Return the chicken to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
7. In a separate bowl, mix the green beans with the onion powder and honey.
8. In a large oven-safe skillet or casserole dish, layer the chicken, coconut milk sauce, and green beans.
9. Dot the top of the dish with the remaining butter.
10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
11. Serve the Chicken green beans with lime in the coconut dish hot, garnished with additional lime zest and a sprinkle of cilantro, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Chicken green beans with lime in the coconut dish!

gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F; line a large baking sheet with a Silpat liner (if available).
To prepare the butternut, trim off the top and bottom ends.
Cut the squash in half between the neck (the elongated part) and the base (the bulbous part).
To peel off the skin, use a vegetable peeler, or if the skin is very thick, stand the neck straight up and carefully trim off the skin with a sharp knife (you can cut the neck into 2 pieces first, if its easier).
Peel the base in the same way; once peeled, cut the base in half and scoop out the insides.
Once peeled and de-seeded, cut the squash into 1-inch cubes.
Toss the squash with the oil, butter, brown sugar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl, then spread it in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake 20 minutes, stirring once halfway through.
Toss the onion, apple, thyme, and lemon juice together in a large bowl.
After the squash has cooked for the first 20 minutes, remove it from the oven and turn the oven up to 450 degrees F. Pour the onion/apple mixture onto the tray with the squash and gently toss it together.
Bake until everything is tender, about 20 minutes, stirring halfway through.
If you want the veggies to brown a bit more, you can run them under the broiler for a couple minutes.
Keep a close eye on them though!
Taste and season with additional salt and pepper as desired; serve.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Cut the butternut squash into evenly sized pieces and toss them in a bowl with a drizzle of canola oil and a sprinkle of brown sugar. Season with salt, pepper, and thyme.
3. Spread the squash pieces out on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
4. Roast the squash in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are slightly caramelized and the flesh is tender.
5. While the squash is roasting, melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat.
6. Add the minced onion to the melted butter and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
7. Add the chopped apples to the onion mixture and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until the apples are slightly softened.
8. Add the lemon juice to the apples and onion mixture, stirring to combine.
9. Once the squash is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Add the apple and onion mixture to the roasted squash, stirring to combine.
11. Serve the Sweet & Savory Roasted Butternut Squash immediately, as it is delicious and best enjoyed fresh.

gt:
Combine dry ingredients; cut in butter till crumbly.
Stir in whatever you like -- blueberries, cranberries, orange or lemon zest, candied ginger, chocolate chips, etc.
Add milk and stir just until moistened.
Turn out on floured board, flour hands and knead 10-15 times and pat/roll into 3/4" thick round shape.
Cut into wedges and place on baking sheet (greased or parchment).
Leave a little space in between as they poof up a bit.
Bake at 400 deg F for 18-22 minutes (15-16 is enough in my oven).
You can sprinkle with sugar before baking, or after baking can drizzle with powdered sugar glaze, etc.
Very versatile!
pred:
[INST]
To prepare Basic Scones, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
3. Cut the cold butter into small pieces and add it to the dry ingredients. Using your hands, mix the butter into the flour mixture until the dough is crumbly and well-combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the milk and egg together.
5. Pour the milk mixture into the flour mixture, and mix until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, you can add a bit more milk, a tablespoon at a time.
6. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead it gently until it forms a smooth, elastic ball.
7. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1 inch (2.5 cm). Cut the dough into triangles or other desired shapes using a sharp knife or cookie cutter.
8. Place the scones on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the scones in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
10. Remove the scones from the oven and let them cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before serving.

The essential ingredients for preparing Basic Scones are: 2 34 cups all-purpose flour,2 teaspoons baking powder,12 teaspoon salt,12 cup sugar,34 cup butter, cold,1 cup milk.

[/INST]

[/INST]

gt:
Cut the burdock root and Japanese red Kintoki carrot into 8 cm sticks.
Add the seasoning ingredients to a frying pan, and simmer the burdock root first for 5 minutes over medium-low heat.
Then add the carrot.
After adding the carrot, continue simmering for 5 minutes.
Add the green beans next.
If the sauce is almost gone, add a small amount of dashi stock, and simmer for 2 minutes, then turn off the heat.
Combine the ingredients for the finish.
You can use cooking sake, but refined sake adds more flavour.
Open up the beef slices, and lay 2 sticks of each vegetable on top, then tightly roll diagonally.
Melt the beef tallow (or vegetable oil) in the frying pan, and place them joint sides down, then fry.
Flip them.
When they are browned, add the Step 3 combined ingredients.
Cover with a lid, and continue pan-frying for 3 minutes over medium heat.
Remove the lid, and continue pan-frying for another 1 - 2 minutes, then you're done.
When cooled, cut with a knife, and serve on a plate.
pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Wash and peel the Burdock root and Kintoki carrot (or normal carrot).
- Cut the green beans into bite-sized pieces.
- Slice the beef into thin strips.
- Clean and chop the green onions.
- Clean and chop the garlic.
- Clean and chop the ginger.

2. Prepare the dashi stock:
- In a small saucepan, bring 4 cups of water to a boil.
- Add 1/2 cup of kelp and 1/2 cup of dried bonito flakes.
- Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the kelp is tender.
- Strain the stock through a fine-mesh sieve, discarding the solids.

3. Prepare the sauce:
- In a small bowl, mix the sugar, soy sauce, and refined sake.

4. Prepare the Hachiman Rolls:
- In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat.
- Add the green beans and cook until they are tender but still crisp.
- Add the sliced beef and cook until it is browned and cooked through.
- Add the dashi stock and cook until the liquid has been absorbed.
- Add the sauce mixture and cook until the sauce has thickened and coated the beef and vegetables.
- Serve the Hachiman Rolls immediately.

5. Enjoy your delicious Hachiman Rolls!

[/INST]

gt:
Peel squash, cut in half lengthwise, and remove seeds.
Cut into 1 1/2 inch cubes and steam until tender.
Place steamed butternut squash cubes and all other ingredients in a food processor or blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Serve hot or warm.
pred:
To cook a delightful Maple Butternut Squash Puree dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the butternut squash in half lengthwise and remove the seeds and membranes. Place the squash cut-side down on a baking sheet.
3. Drizzle the squash with ghee or clarified butter, and season with salt, pumpkin pie spice, and rice milk or soymilk or almond milk.
4. Roast the squash in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until it is tender and slightly caramelized.
5. Remove the squash from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Using a fork, scrape the flesh from the squash and transfer it to a blender or food processor.
7. Add the maple syrup and rice milk or soymilk or almond milk to the blender or food processor, and blend until smooth and creamy.
8. Taste and adjust the seasoning if needed.

This Maple Butternut Squash Puree dish is a delicious and healthy option for those who prefer a lactose-free diet. The combination of the tender butternut squash, rich maple syrup, and warm spices creates a comforting and satisfying meal.

gt:
In a large saucepan over high heat, cover potatoes with water and 1 tablespoon salt.
Bring to boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 to 25 minutes.
Drain well.
Place potatoes in an electric mixing bowl with a paddle.
Break up potatoes well, then replace paddle with a wire whip.
Beat at medium speed until mashed.
Add butter and half-and-half slowly and continue to beat potatoes until desired consistency is reached.
Season with white pepper and remaining salt.
Serve hot.
pred:
1. Wash the potatoes thoroughly to remove any dirt or debris.
2. Cut the potatoes into evenly sized pieces, making sure not to cut all the way through.
3. Place the potatoes in a large pot or a steamer basket, and cover them with water.
4. Bring the potatoes to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender but not mushy.
5. Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.
6. Add the salt, pepper, and half-and-half to the pot.
7. Using a potato masher or a fork, mash the potatoes until they reach the desired consistency.
8. Stir in the butter and adjust the seasoning as needed.
9. Serve the Mom Pan's Creamy Mashed Potatoes immediately.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and creamy Mom Pan's Creamy Mashed Potatoes.

gt:
Put your unbaked pie shell into a pie dish.
Mix together all of the ingredients (except pie shell) and pour into the pie she shell.
Bake at 375F for about 60 to 65 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
pred:
To create a delightful Pumpkin Eggnog Pie dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, eggs, salt, and nutmeg. Whisk until smooth.

3. Gradually add the pumpkin pie spice and eggnog to the mixture, whisking until well combined.

4. Pour the mixture into the unbaked pastry shell.

5. Bake the pie for 45-50 minutes, or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.

6. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before serving.

7. Enjoy your delicious Pumpkin Eggnog Pie!

[/INST]

gt:
In a large mixing bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, brown sugar, Espelette pepper or hot paprika, oregano, garlic and salt and pepper.
Mix well.
Flatten chicken and add to marinade, turning it until coated.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour or overnight.
Prepare a grill, arranging coals or gas flame so it is hot on only one side.
Place chicken skin-side down on unheated side of grill (so it will cook by indirect heat).
Grill, basting every 5 minutes and turning chicken once about halfway through, until juices run clear when chicken is pierced near joint of thigh, about 30 minutes.
Remove chicken from grill and allow to rest 5 minutes.
Carve as desired, and serve.
pred:
To cook Publican Chicken with these ingredients, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, brown sugar, Espelette pepper, dried oregano, garlic, salt, and pepper.
3. Rinse the chicken and pat it dry with paper towels.
4. Place the chicken in a large roasting pan or a baking dish.
5. Pour the marinade over the chicken, ensuring it is evenly distributed.
6. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing it into portions.
8. Serve the Publican Chicken with your favorite side dishes, such as rice, potatoes, or a green salad.

These steps will ensure that you have a delicious and well-prepared Publican Chicken dish, using the provided ingredients.

gt:
Crush the cookies in food processor or large Ziplock bag, then stir in melted butter.
Put 1 teaspoon cookie mixture into 18-22 mini tart or mini muffin cups.
Tamp down with thumb or tart press to create a bottom crust.
Combine the rest of the ingredients except the turkey bacon.
Spoon about 1-2 Tablespoons of the mixture into each mini tart cup.
Sprinkle turkey bacon over the tops of each quiche.
Bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
If desired, broil 2-5 minutes or until lightly browned on top.
***To bake a full pie: Cover with foil and bake at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Remove foil and broil 2-5 minutes or until lightly browned on top.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the lemon shortbread cookies, melted butter, and a pinch of salt. Mix until the cookies are evenly coated.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and milk together until well combined. Add the shredded gruyere cheese, red bell pepper, yellow onion, salt, black pepper, thyme, and tarragon. Mix until the ingredients are well combined.

4. Pour the egg mixture over the cookie mixture, and stir gently to combine.

5. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan.

6. Bake the quiche in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly wobbly.

7. Remove the quiche from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

8. Once the quiche is completely cooled, use a sharp knife to cut it into bite-sized pieces.

9. Serve the Gluten Free Lemon & Gruyere Quiche Bites immediately, or store them in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

Enjoy your delicious Gluten Free Lemon & Gruyere Quiche Bites!

gt:
Prepare and cook rice according to package directions.
In a large skillet, melt butter, and saute celery,onion, bell pepper,carrot, and walnuts.
Stir in cayenne pepper.
Prepare chicken stuffing acording to package directions.
In a large bowl, combine rice, celery-carrot mixture, egg, and prepared stuffing mix.
Fold in chicken broth.
Spoon mixture into a buttered 3 quart baking dish.
Cover and bake for 35 minutes.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the long grain and wild rice blend, chopped celery, onion, red bell pepper, grated carrot, and chopped walnuts.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the butter, cayenne pepper, chicken flavor stuffing mix, and chicken broth.
4. Add the egg to the bowl with the rice mixture and stir to combine.
5. Pour the butter mixture over the rice mixture and stir until well combined.
6. Transfer the mixture to a large, greased baking dish.
7. Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the stuffing is cooked through and the edges are golden brown.
8. Serve hot and enjoy your delicious An Enjoyable Stuffing dish!

gt:
Soak the gelatin in two tablespoons water (not listed).
Dissolve the matcha tea in two tablespoons of water.
Heat the milk and sugar using your microwave oven's "milk-warming" function (if available), and dissolve the gelatin.
Add the matcha tea powder a bit at a time to the warm milk, and mix well to dissolve.
The tea will form clumps if you add too much at once.
Next, add the soy milk.
Strain the mixture into a bowl, and chill the bowl over ice water.
If you cool the liquid until it thickens a bit, the matcha tea will disperse more evenly throughout the mixture.
Wet the ramekins and pour the jelly liquid into them.
Chill until set.
Try topping the jelly with brown sugar syrup.
It's delicious that way too.
pred:
[/INST]

To make Increased Calcium Absorption! Milk Jelly, Green Tea Edition, follow these steps:
1. In a saucepan, combine 150 ml of milk and 150 ml of soy milk.
2. Add 3 tbsp of sugar and stir until the sugar is fully dissolved.
3. In a separate bowl, mix 2 tsp of matcha and 5 grams of gelatin.
4. Slowly pour the matcha mixture into the milk mixture while stirring continuously.
5. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it reaches the desired consistency.
6. Remove the mixture from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Pour the mixture into a mold or a silicone mold and let it set in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
8. Once the jelly has set, remove it from the mold and enjoy your Increased Calcium Absorption! Milk Jelly, Green Tea Edition.

gt:
Cut oranges in half around the equator.
Keep the orange halves intact and carefully scoop out the orange flesh and reserve the flesh for another use.
Keep the orange peel halves intact.
Mix remaining ingredients together.
Fill one half of an orange peel with batter.
Put the empty half of orange peel on top.
Wrap the orange with three layers of heavy duty aluminum foil.
Repeat with the remaining orange peel halves and muffin batter.
Throw the aluminum foil covered oranges in a hot camp fire!
Turn every minute or so, and cook for about 5 or 6 minutes.
Muffins will steam inside the orange peel and the orange peel will insulate the muffin from the fire.
Pull one out of the fire (carefully), open up the foil and check to see if a muffin is done.
If not: Throw it back into fire!
If so: remove all of the muffins from the fire.
Open and eat muffins out of the center of orange peel with a spoon.
pred:
To make a delicious Upscale Campfire Dessert Orange Blueberry Muffins dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 6 whole Oranges, 3/4 cups Milk, 1/4 cups Vegetable Oil, and 2 whole Large Eggs. Whisk the ingredients together until well combined.
3. Add the 18 Ounce Box of Blueberry Muffin Mix to the bowl. Stir the mixture until the batter is smooth and well combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
5. Bake the muffins in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
6. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

This delicious Upscale Campfire Dessert Orange Blueberry Muffins dish is perfect for a warm, cozy campfire gathering, as the orange and blueberry flavors complement each other, and the muffins are easy to serve and enjoy.

gt:
Mix shortening, brown sugar, and molasses thoroughly.
Stir in 2/3 cup water.
Blend flour, soda, salt, and spices; stir into molasses mixture.
Chill for about 1 hour.
Roll the dough about 1/4 inch thick.
Cut with boy and girl cookie cutters.
Make egg yolk paint by blending egg yolks and 1/2 teaspoon water.
Divide the yolk among a few small bowls, and add food coloring to each cup for desired color.
Paint the clothes and decorations on the cookies as desired.
Carefully transfer to a lightly greased baking sheet.
Using a toothpick, make a hole in the top of each cookie.
Press raisins into dough for eyes, nose, mouth.
Use bits of candied cherries for coat buttons, and strips of citron for ties.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes.
Cool slightly, then carefully remove from baking sheet.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the shortening and brown sugar until fluffy.
3. Add the dark molasses, cold water, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, allspice, ginger, cloves, and cinnamon.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until a smooth dough forms.
6. If the dough is too dry, add a little more water, a tablespoon at a time, until it reaches the desired consistency.
7. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. After chilling, roll out the dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
9. Use cookie cutters to cut out the shapes of the Gingerbread Boys And Girls.
10. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
11. Bake the cookies for 8-10 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.
12. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
13. Once the cookies are completely cooled, you can decorate them with frosting, icing, or other embellishments of your choice.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Gingerbread Boys And Girls!

gt:
Using a mortar and pestle, mash the garlic and salt together until you have a smooth paste.
Turn the mortar while you mash, scraping down the garlic from the sides with the pestle.
Add the lemon juice, then add the olive oil, drop by drop, as you continue to crush the paste with the pestle.
Keep turning the pestle with a slow, continuous circular motion around the mortar as you drip the oil in slowly and steadily, making sure the paste absorbs the olive oil.
Keep adding the oil until the sauce has the consistency of a very thick mayonnaise.
If your aioli becomes too dense, add 1/2 teaspoon of water to thin it out.
This process takes time around 20 minutes of slow, circular motions around the mortar to create a dense, rich sauce.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the shrimp, shells on, with the extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, and a pinch of salt. Mix well, cover, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
3. In a large pot, combine the carrots, onions, peeled tomatoes, sweet pimenton de la Vera, brandy, and water. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
4. Add the broken fideos or angel hair pasta to the pot, stirring gently to combine. Cook for about 10 minutes, or until the pasta is al dente.
5. Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the melted butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Transfer the cooked pasta and shrimp mixture to a large oven-safe baking dish.
7. Drizzle the remaining Spanish extra virgin olive oil over the top of the dish.
8. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the pasta is golden brown.
9. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious shrimp and pasta dish!

gt:
Prepare the ravioli according to the package instructions.
When they are done drain off the water and set ravioli aside in a large bowl.
Heat a medium pan over medium-high heat.
Add the bacon and cook until crispy, about 5-6 minutes.
Remove the bacon from the pan but leave the bacon grease.
Set the bacon aside.
When its cool enough to handle, crumble it.
Add the spinach to the bacon grease and cook it until it is just wilted, about 3-4 minutes.
Mix the spinach with the ravioli and top with the bacon and cheese.
Serve it warm!
pred:
1. Prepare the pasta: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until it reaches the desired doneness.
2. Prepare the filling: In a large bowl, combine the frozen ravioli, bacon, spinach, and goat cheese.
3. Preheat the stovetop: Place a large pot or skillet on the stovetop and heat it over medium heat.
4. Cook the filling: Add the pasta mixture to the pot or skillet, stirring gently to combine. Cook the mixture for about 5-7 minutes, or until the pasta is heated through and the filling is warmed through.
5. Serve: Once the pasta is cooked, use a spatula to transfer the mixture to a serving dish. Serve immediately and enjoy!

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious Stovetop Ravioli with Spinach, Bacon, and Goat Cheese.

gt:
Reserve 3/4 cup cake mix.
Combine remaining cake mix and 1 egg in large bowl and beat until smooth.
Add butter and mix well.
Press into bottom of a 13x9 inch baking pan.
Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine brown sugar, corn syrup, 3 eggs, vanilla and almond extracts, chopped pecans and reserved cake mix in large bowl and mix well.
Pour over the baked layer and bake for 25 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
Cool and cut into squares.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9x9 inch baking pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the yellow cake mix, egg, and softened butter. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the dark brown sugar and dark Karo syrup to the mixture, stirring until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, vanilla, and almond extract.
6. Add the egg mixture to the cake mixture, stirring until well combined.
7. Fold in the chopped pecans.
8. Pour the batter into the prepared baking pan.
9. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
10. Allow the brownies to cool in the pan for about 10-15 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

These Pecan Pie Brownies are a delicious and indulgent treat that combines the flavors of pecans, dark brown sugar, and dark Karo syrup. The addition of almond extract adds a subtle, refreshing note to the overall taste. The recipe calls for 15 ounces of yellow cake mix, 1 egg, 1 cup butter, 34 cup dark brown sugar, 3 eggs, 12 teaspoon vanilla, 12 teaspoon almond extract, and 1 cup chopped pecans. The batter is poured into a 9x9 inch baking pan and baked at 350°F (175°C) for 25-30 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean. Allow the brownies to cool in the pan for about 10-15 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

gt:
Put the cut up bananas in a medium bowl.
Combine the orange juice with the bananas and gently toss a couple of times to coat bananas.
This method should keep bananas from turning brown.
Take a wooden skewer and thread your fruit on.
*To enhance the sweetness of the strawberries, instead of using whole strawberries, cut each one in half place in a medium bowl and add a wee bit of sugar and toss around.
Method 2.
Add about 5 large tbsp of apple jelly to a small saucepan and stir over a medium jelly, until it because less lumpy, let cool.
Slice bananas and coat with apple jelly.
Slice strawberries and cut in half and coat with either sugar or apple jelly.
Slice the rest of the fruit and set aside.
Stick the fruit on the skewers.
Enjoy!
pred:
To create delicious Fresh Fruit Kebabs, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. Prepare the wooden skewers by soaking them in water for 30 minutes to prevent them from burning.
3. In a large bowl, mix the cut-up bananas, pineapple chunks, strawberries, seedless grapes, and orange juice.
4. Allow the mixture to sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Skewer the fruit mixture onto the wooden skewers, alternating between bananas, pineapple, strawberries, and grapes.
6. If desired, drizzle apple jelly over the fruit skewers for added sweetness and flavor.
7. Grill the fruit skewers on the preheated grill or grill pan for about 10-15 minutes, or until the fruit is tender and slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the fruit skewers from the grill and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Fresh Fruit Kebabs!

gt:
Preheat oven to 200 degrees C (380 degrees F).
Give the potatoes a quick scrub and cut them into small cubes (roughly 2x2cm).
Throw into a bowl, and use a spatula to make sure they get a good coating of oil.
Sprinkle some salt over, too.
Then layer them out on a baking tray ideally lined with parchment paper, and roast for 25 minutes.
Halfway through, stir them around a bit, again making sure the oil coats them.
In the meantime, peel and crush the pistachios (we found the easiest way was to put them in a bowl after shelling and use something sturdy and heavy like a thick glass or end of a rolling pin to crush them).
Wash and slice the spring onion into fine rings, then add them to the bowl.
Add the basil to the bowl too (cut first if using leaves).
Add maple syrup, mustard, olive oil and water and stir well.
Remove the potatoes from the oven, and transfer to plates or bowls, with dressing on the side.
pred:
[INST]To prepare Roasted Sweet Potato Cubes with a Piquant Pistachio Dressing, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash the sweet potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the sweet potatoes into 1-inch cubes.
4. Toss the sweet potato cubes with salt to taste.
5. Spread the cubes out on a baking sheet, making sure they are not overcrowded.
6. Roast the sweet potato cubes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. While the sweet potatoes are roasting, prepare the pistachio dressing.
8. In a small bowl, mix the roasted pistachios, spring onions, dried basil, maple syrup, Dijon mustard, and olive oil.
9. Season the pistachio dressing with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Once the sweet potato cubes are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
11. Toss the sweet potato cubes with the pistachio dressing, ensuring that they are evenly coated.
12. Serve the Roasted Sweet Potato Cubes with Piquant Pistachio Dressing immediately, or store them in the refrigerator for later use.

[/INST]

[/INST]

gt:
Fill a highball glass with some ice.
Pour all liquid ingredients into the glass.
Stir ingredients.
Add the cherry on top.
Enjoy!
pred:
1. Begin by pouring the Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Add the premium vodka to the shaker, and then shake the mixture well.
3. Next, pour the cranberry and pineapple juices into the shaker, and continue shaking until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
5. Garnish the Midori Sex on the Beach with a maraschino cherry.
6. Enjoy your delicious Midori Sex on the Beach cocktail.

[/INST]

gt:
You will need a large Dutch oven with a lid for best results.
Add just enough olive oil to coat the pan and turn the heat high enough to make the oil shimmer, but not smoke.
Pat the meat dry and dredge in flour, seasoned with kosher salt & cracked pepper.
Add one piece of meat to the hot oil to make sure that it sizzles.
Add the remaining meat, without crowding the pan and sear for about 3-4 minutes per side.
You want a golden crust that will give the gravy great flavor.
Cook the meat in batches, if necessary and set aside in a bowl-- to collect the juice.
When all the meat is seared, turn the heat to medium and add a little more olive oil to the pan and cook the onion until tender-- 3-4 minutes.
Add the sliced garlic and cook till fragrant-- 30 seconds or so.
Add the tomato paste and paprika, and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the tomato sauce, caraway seeds, lemon zest and chicken stock and stir well.
Bring to a simmer for about 15 minutes and taste for seasoning.
Adjust as necessary.
If the sauce is too thick, thin with a little more chicken stock or water until it is the consistency of a gravy.
Simmer for 2 hours, or you can use a slow cooker for 4-6 hours.
This stew tastes even better if made one day in advance.
Serve or buttered egg noodles or spaetzle or Bavarian Bread Dumplings "Semmel Knoedel", which is posted on my blog:.
http://foodiewife-kitchen.blogspot.com/2009/10/bavarian-dumplings-on-halloween-no.html.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large, oven-safe skillet or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onions and cook until they are softened and translucent, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the seasoned flour to the skillet, stirring constantly to create a roux. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the flour is lightly browned.
4. Add the sliced garlic to the skillet and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.
5. Add the cut meat to the skillet, breaking it up into bite-sized pieces as it cooks. Cook the meat until it is browned and cooked through, about 10-15 minutes.
6. Add the tomato paste to the skillet, stirring to combine with the meat and onions. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the tomato paste has melted and the mixture is well combined.
7. Add the tomato sauce, beef (or chicken) stock, and lemon zest to the skillet. Stir to combine, then bring the mixture to a simmer.
8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let the goulash simmer for 1-2 hours, or until the meat is tender and the sauce has thickened.
9. Season the goulash with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Serve the goulash over a bed of mashed potatoes or rice, and enjoy!

[/INST]

This comprehensive recipe for Austrian Goulash includes detailed instructions on how to prepare the ingredients, cook the dish, and season it to perfection. The use of the accompanying ingredients, such as the cut meat, onions, garlic, tomato paste, and other spices, will ensure a delicious and authentic Austrian Goulash experience.

gt:
Combine chicken, celery and chives in a medium bowl.
I use bone-in, skin-on chicken breast that I season with salt, pepper and garlic and roast at 400 degrees for 30-35 minutes.
Discard the skin and bones and cut into cubes.
Add mayo and yogurt and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve on a whole wheat bun or scoop onto a bed of lettuce.
pred:
To make a delicious Chicken Salad dish, follow these steps:
1. Cook the chicken breasts according to your preferred method (e.g., boiling, grilling, or baking). Once cooked, let them cool and then chop them into small, even pieces.
2. In a large bowl, combine the cooked chicken, chopped celery ribs, mayonnaise, plain fat-free yogurt, salt, and pepper. Mix well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. Add the chopped chives to the bowl and mix gently.
4. Taste the salad and adjust the seasoning as needed.
5. Serve the Chicken Salad on a bed of lettuce or a sandwich, or use it as a topping for a variety of dishes.

This Chicken Salad dish is a delicious and healthy option, as it is rich in protein from the chicken, and it contains a variety of nutrients from the vegetables and yogurt.

gt:
Saute veggies in olive oil until slightly tender.
Add spices and flour and cook for a minute.
Deglaze pan slowly with broth, letting it thicken up.
Add beans (drained), tomatoes and kale (pre-cooked, drained and chopped).
Cook on low for 20 to 30 minutes.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add the onion, celery, and bell pepper, and sauté until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the thyme, basil, rosemary, oregano, red pepper flakes, and black pepper to the pot. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
5. Add the flour to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the flour is slightly browned.
6. Gradually pour in the chicken or vegetable broth, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
7. Add the beans, tomatoes, and kale to the pot. Stir to combine.
8. Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
9. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Serve the Tuscan Soup hot, garnished with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil and a sprinkle of freshly grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Stir red cabbage, mango, pistachios, and 1 tablespoon mint together in a large salad bowl.
Whisk truffle oil, agave nectar, lime juice, champagne vinegar, and salt in a small bowl and pour dressing over salad; toss to combine.
Garnish with 1 sprig fresh mint.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the shredded red cabbage, peeled and seeded mango wedges, and chopped mint.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the truffle oil, agave nectar, lime juice, and champagne vinegar.
3. Pour the dressing over the cabbage mixture and toss to coat evenly.
4. Add the roasted, shelled pistachios and toss again.
5. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Combine first 3 ingredients in large bowl.
Mix remaining ingredients until blended.
Add to coleslaw mixture; toss to evenly coat.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
pred:

2. In a small bowl, mix the Miracle Whip Dressing, honey, and poppy seeds.
3. Pour the dressing mixture over the coleslaw mixture and toss to coat evenly.
4. Serve immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.
