gt:
Bring water up to boil, add quinoa, then turn down to a simmer for 10-15 minutes, until done.
In large bowl, combine all salad ingredients, stir to combine
Prepare dressing by whisking ingredients for 1-2 minutes.
Pour over salad and stir well to combine.
** I prefer extra lime juice and cilantro!
Make it your own!
*
pred:
1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and place it in a medium saucepan with 2 cups of water. Bring the water to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed.

2. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, chopped tomatoes, red bell pepper, red onion, corn, black beans, cilantro, minced garlic, diced jalapeno, olive oil, ground cumin, and juiced limes.

3. Season the salad with sea salt to taste.

4. Serve the Quinoa Salad immediately or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

This Quinoa Salad recipe provides a healthy and nutritious meal option, incorporating a variety of flavors and textures. The combination of quinoa, tomatoes, red bell pepper, red onion, corn, black beans, and cilantro creates a delicious and balanced dish. The addition of garlic, jalapeno, and olive oil enhances the flavor, while the lime juice and cumin provide a zesty and aromatic touch. This salad can be enjoyed as a main course or a side dish and is suitable for various dietary preferences and restrictions.

gt:
Preheat grill or broiler.
Mix all ingredients except salmon.
Add salmon coat on both sides and marinate for 30 minutes.
Remove from marinade and grill or broil about 4-5 minutes per side.
Dip back in marinade before serving.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, Dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, orange rind, salt, and pepper.
3. Place the salmon steaks in a baking dish, and pour the glaze mixture over them.
4. Bake the salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Remove the salmon from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This cooking procedure involves a simple yet flavorful combination of ingredients to create a delicious Glazed Salmon dish. The olive oil, Dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, orange rind, salt, and pepper work together to create a rich, tangy, and slightly sweet glaze that coats the salmon steaks evenly. The baking process ensures that the fish is cooked to perfection, and the glaze caramelizes and becomes slightly crispy on the surface. The resting time allows the flavors to meld together, making the dish even more enjoyable.

gt:
Coat a large pot with cooking spray and place over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir chicken, bell peppers and onion until chicken is brown and peppers are just tender.
Stir in corn, beans, tomatoes, tomato sauce and water.
Season with chili powder, parsley, garlic powder, cayenne and cumin.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 30 minutes.
pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the diced chicken and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the diced onion, green and red bell peppers, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the frozen corn kernels, kidney beans, and diced tomatoes to the pot. Stir to combine.
4. Add the canned tomato sauce, water, chili powder, dried parsley, garlic powder, ground cayenne pepper, and ground cumin. Stir to combine.
5. Return the cooked chicken to the pot, cover, and simmer for about 30-45 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
6. Serve the Chicken Chili Soup hot, garnished with fresh parsley and a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
In a small skillet, saute' peppers in oil for 5 minutes or until tender; cool slightly.
In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
In a small bowl, whisk the egg, buttermilk, butter and peppers until blended.
Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.
Fill paper-lined miniature muffin cups three-fourths full.
Bake at 425 degrees for 6-9 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the melted butter, egg, and buttermilk.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the diced sweet and green peppers.
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake the muffins for 12-15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of one of the muffins comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes before removing them from the muffin tin and transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Mini Pepper Corn Muffins!

gt:
Cook spaghetti as directed on package, omitting salt.
Meanwhile, cook and stir bacon and onions in large skillet on medium-high heat 8 min.
or until bacon is crisp and onions are tender.
Remove from skillet; drain.
Wipe skillet with paper towel.
Drain spaghetti.
Immediately add to skillet along with the bacon mixture and all remaining ingredients; toss until cream cheese is completely melted and sauce is well blended.
pred:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, cook the onion over medium heat until softened.
4. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet and toss to combine with the onion.
5. In a small bowl, mix the cream cheese and dressing until smooth.
6. Add the cream cheese mixture to the skillet with the spaghetti and onion. Cook until the sauce is heated through and the spaghetti is coated evenly.
7. Stir in the crispy bacon and grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Spaghetti Carbonara immediately.

gt:
Cook the noodles in boiling salted water until they are tender but not mushy.
drain and rinse in cold water, toss with 1 Tbls of the oil.
Beat together the tahini, sugar, soy sauce, vinegar and remaining oil.
Add a dash of hot sauce, taste and season as necessary.
Thin the sauce with hot water until it is the consistency of heavy cream.
Toss the noodles with the sauce, garnish with scallions and serve.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the chinese egg noodles and tahini or peanut butter.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, and Frank's red hot sauce.
3. Pour the sauce mixture over the noodles and tahini or peanut butter, and stir to combine.
4. Add minced fresh scallions to the mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Serve the Sesame Cold Noodles cold, as desired.

The Sesame Cold Noodles are a delicious and refreshing dish that can be enjoyed as a light meal or snack. The combination of the noodles, sesame oil, tahini or peanut butter, sugar, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, and Frank's red hot sauce creates a flavorful and satisfying dish. The addition of minced fresh scallions adds a touch of freshness and crunch to the dish, enhancing the overall taste and texture.

gt:
Preheat oven 375F.
Grease and flour (or use cooking spray) bottom and sides of 12 muffin tins.
Combine flour and 3/4 cup sugar.
Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs; reserve 1 cup of mixture setting aside.
To crumb mixture in bowl add baking powder, soda, salt, sour cream, 1 egg and almond extract blending well.
Divide among 12 to 14 muffin cups.
Combine cream cheese, 1/4 cup sugar, and 1 egg and pour over batter in pan.
Sprinkle reserved 1 cup of crumb mixture over all.
Bake 20 to 25 minutes.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. Add the butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the sour cream, egg, almond extract, and cream cheese.
5. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry mixture, stirring until just combined.
6. Fill the muffin tins with the batter, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Cream Cheese Coffee Cake Muffins!

gt:
Mix together mayo, ketchup and horseradish in a small bowl.
Set aside.
This will be an easy alternative to traditional Russian Dressing.
Slice English muffins and toast.
In large skillet over medium heat, saute pastrami until heated through and browned slightly.
Add in sauerkraut and sautee in the same pan as the pastrami until hot.
Remove pastrami and kraut and set aside.
Add butter to the pan and allow to melt.
Gently crack and drop in eggs into the pan.
Allow to set and when halfway cooked, about 1 minute, gently flip them over and allow to cook until the whites have all just set.
Slather mayo/ketchup/horseradish mixture onto the English muffins, top with pastrami, kraut and fried egg.
Promptly devour.
Note: Recipe for Pumpernickel Rye English Muffins can be found in my Tasty Kitchen recipe box.
pred:
[INST]
1. First, prepare the sauerkraut by washing it thoroughly and draining it.
2. Next, prepare the mayonnaise by mixing it with the ketchup, horseradish puree, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
3. Toast the pumpernickel rye English muffins by spreading them with butter and toasting them in a toaster or on a griddle.
4. Slice the pastrami deli meat into thin strips.
5. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and season them with salt and pepper.
6. Preheat a skillet or griddle over medium heat.
7. Spread a thin layer of mayonnaise on one side of each toasted English muffin.
8. Place a slice of pastrami on the mayonnaised side of each English muffin.
9. Add a layer of sauerkraut on top of the pastrami.
10. Pour the whisked eggs over the sauerkraut, covering it completely.
11. Cook the sandwiches on the skillet or griddle until the eggs are set and the bread is golden brown.
12. Serve the Reuben Breakfast Sandwiches warm and enjoy!

[/INST]

gt:
To cook the quinoa: Rinse quinoa thoroughly and allow to drain.
Place dry quinoa and 1 1/2 cup water in a saucepan and cook until cooked but not mushythis was about 20 minutes for me.
I would imagine it depends on the age/freshness of your quinoa.
If it absorbs the liquid before it gets tender to your liking, add more liquid and continue cooking.
Drain excess water and allow to cool.
For the salad: Remove the tough stems from your kale.
I used a lovely kale mix from a local farm stand.
If youre using large kale leaves, make sure the tough ribs are gone.
Roughly chop the kale into bite-sized pieces.
Mix in chopped apples.
Set aside.
For the dressing: Whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice and zest, horseradish, mustard, and honey.
Taste and add salt and pepper as needed.
To assemble: Toss cooled, cooked quinoa in the dressing.
Add dressed quinoa mixture to the kale and apples.
Place on individual plates or a large serving platter.
Crumble goat cheese on top of the salad and serve immediately.
pred:
[INST]<<SYS>>
To craft a delicious Black Quinoa & Kale Salad, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the rinsed and drained kale leaves, chopped apples, and black quinoa.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the extra virgin olive oil, lemon zest and juice, horseradish, mustard, honey, sea salt, and ground pepper.
3. Pour the dressing over the kale and quinoa mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
4. Allow the salad to sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the Black Quinoa & Kale Salad immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

Enjoy your delicious Black Quinoa & Kale Salad!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease 9x13 inch baking dish.
Arrange potatoes over the bottom of the dish, and set aside.
Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Add the garlic and onion; cook and stir until the onion is transparent, about 5 minutes.
Stir in 3 tablespoons butter until melted.
Sprinkle the flour, salt, and pepper over the onion mixture.
Cook and stir until mixture bubbles and thickens, about 2 minutes.
Continue to stir the flour mixture while gradually pouring in the milk and buttermilk, and return the mixture to boiling.
Stir in 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese; cook for 2 minutes until melted, and mixture is smooth.
Pour the mixture over the potatoes in the baking dish, stirring to coat evenly.
Bake in preheated oven for 1/2 hour, and stir.
Bake 1/2 hour longer, stir the potato mixture again, and sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes more.
pred:
To make a delicious Buttermilk Parmesan Potatoes dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the cubed potatoes with the minced garlic, red onion, and 3 tablespoons of butter. Season the potatoes with salt and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the 2% milk, buttermilk, and 1/3 cup of flour.
4. Pour the milk mixture over the potatoes and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the potatoes to a baking dish and sprinkle half of the Parmesan cheese evenly over the top.
6. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are tender and golden brown.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Drizzle the remaining Parmesan cheese over the potatoes and serve immediately.

The ingredients used in this recipe include 14 small potatoes, peeled and cubed; 1 tablespoon butter; 2 cloves garlic, minced; 1/4 cup minced red onion; 3 tablespoons butter; 1/3 cup all-purpose flour; 1/2 teaspoon salt; 1/4 teaspoon pepper; 1 cup 2% milk; 1 cup buttermilk; 1 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, divided. The dish is a delicious blend of flavors and textures, with the creamy buttermilk, tangy Parmesan cheese, and the crispy, golden-brown potatoes.

gt:
Position 1 rack in top third of oven and 1 rack in bottom third of oven and preheat to 425F.
Spray 2 large rimmed baking sheets with nonstick spray.
Whisk mustard, olive oil, butter, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, lemon peel, and salt in large bowl to blend.
Add potatoes; sprinkle generously with freshly ground black pepper and toss to coat.
Divide potatoes between prepared baking sheets, leaving any excess mustard mixture behind in bowl.
Spread potatoes in single layer.
Roast potatoes 20 minutes.
Reverse baking sheets and roast until potatoes are crusty outside and tender inside, turning occasionally, about 25 minutes longer.
DO AHEAD: Can be made 2 hours ahead.
Let stand on baking sheets at room temperature.
Rewarm potatoes in 425F oven 10 minutes.
Transfer potatoes to serving bowl.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the nonstick vegetable oil spray, Dijon mustard, and melted butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes in the prepared mustard mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Spread the potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
5. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
6. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. In a small bowl, whisk together the fresh lemon juice, garlic, oregano, lemon peel, and coarse kosher salt.
8. Pour the lemon-garlic mixture over the roasted potatoes and toss to coat evenly.
9. Serve the Mustard-Roasted Potatoes immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Sprinkle Cajun seasoning over chicken.
Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-.
high heat.
Add chicken; cook about 10 minutes or until chicken is brown, turning.
occasionally.
Remove chicken and set aside.
Add onions to drippings in skillet; cook and.
stir 2 minutes.
Add jelly, broth and vinegar; cook and stir until jelly melts.
Return chicken to pan; spoon glaze over chicken.
Cover and cook over medium-low heat.
about 5 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender, turning occasionally.
Remove chicken to serving platter.
Increase heat to medium-high and cook until glaze thickens slightly.
Spoon glaze over chicken.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breast halves with the cajun seasoning, ensuring even coverage.
3. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the green onions and cook until softened, about 2-3 minutes.
5. Add the hot pepper jelly and chicken broth to the skillet, stirring to combine. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
6. Add the vinegar to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to coat the chicken with the sauce. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is heated through and the sauce has melded with the chicken.
8. Serve the Pepper Glazed Cajun Chicken over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal!

gt:
Mix turmeric, cinnamon, cumin, salt, paprika, and parsley together.
Rub mixture all over chicken.
Saute onion in butter and oil.
l add garlic.
Brown chicken.
Take out put in a casserole dish.
Add cooked potatoes and cook until lightly browned.
Put potatoes in casserole dish over chicken.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 375 degrees Fahrenheit for 40 minutes.
Uncover; bake another 20 minutes.
Start rice when you uncover chicken.
Heat oil; add rinsed rice and turmeric.
Fry until puffed not burned.
Add boiling water; bring to a boil.
Cover; cook 20 minutes; serve under chicken.
Bake; cover.
pred:
[INSTR]
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken, turmeric, cinnamon, cumin, salt, paprika, and parsley. Mix well.
3. Heat the butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Add the chicken mixture to the skillet, and cook until the chicken is cooked through.
5. Add the rice to the skillet, and stir to combine.
6. Pour the boiling water over the rice and chicken mixture. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the skillet. Cook for about 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
7. Serve the Assyrian Chicken and Potatoes With Yellow Rice hot.

[/INSTR]

[/SYS]

gt:
Boil the fresh chestnuts in their shells.
Let rest for 30 minutes to an hour.
Patiently peel the chestnuts from Step 1.
Soak the peeled chestnuts in water for a while.
Put everything in rice cooker and set it to cook.
pred:
1. Rinse the rice thoroughly in cold water to remove any impurities.
2. In a saucepan, combine the rice, chestnuts, and dashi stock. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the chestnuts are tender.
3. Season the rice with salt and usukuchi soy sauce to taste.
4. Serve the cooked rice immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of chopped green onions if desired.

By following these steps, you can create a delicious and satisfying Chestnut rice dish that combines the flavors of the rice, chestnuts, and the dashi stock, resulting in a delightful meal.

gt:
Marinate backstrap in zip lock Bag (Gallon size preferred) for at least 4 hrs I like to go 3-4 days if possible
Cut Natural casing of sausage.Break up with fingers and pan sear till crumbly and golden brown
Chop up Mushrooms (I like to use baby portabella).Saute with butter till reduced and cooked
Mix crumbly sausage, cooked mushrooms,and Crumbly blue cheese in a bowl.Refrigerat for now.
Take your Marinated Backstrap and butterfly it.Cut it almost in half so it opens like a sub.
Add your mix to the backstrap and fold over.
Take your pieces of bacon and make a weave / blanket with the bacon
Roll stuffed Backstrap with Bacon Blanket ...
Heat Grill up with Medium heat oil grate and place your Bacon wrapped backstrap on the grill.
There will be flare up be prepared (cup of water helps) cook till bacon is crispy on both sides.
15-20 mins total Do Not over cook!!!
!
Let Backstrap settle for 2- 5 mins an Enjoy!
!!!!!!
!
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped mushrooms, crumbly blue cheese, and Italian dressing or Terriyaki sauce.
4. Season the venison backstrap with salt and pepper.
5. Wrap each piece of venison with a piece of bacon, securing it with a toothpick.
6. Place the wrapped venison pieces on a baking sheet, and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the bacon is crispy and the venison is cooked through.
7. Remove the venison from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
8. Serve the venison with the mushroom and blue cheese mixture on the side.

[/INST]

gt:
Light a grill and brush with oil.
Brush the melon wedges with oil and season generously with salt and pepper.
Grill the melon over high heat, turning once, until lightly charred, about 5 minutes.
Transfer the wedges to a platter and top with the prosciutto and mozzarella.
Garnish with parsley, a large pinch of pepper and a drizzle of oil and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix together the extra-virgin olive oil, salt, and pepper.
3. Brush the olive oil mixture onto the cantaloupe wedges, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Place the cantaloupe wedges on the grill, cut-side down, and cook for 3-4 minutes or until the edges are slightly charred and the cantaloupe is tender.
5. Remove the cantaloupe wedges from the grill and place them on a serving platter.
6. While the cantaloupe is cooking, prepare the prosciutto and mozzarella.
7. Slice the prosciutto into thin strips.
8. Slice the mozzarella into thin rounds.
9. Place the prosciutto slices on top of the cantaloupe wedges.
10. Drizzle the remaining olive oil mixture over the cantaloupe and prosciutto.
11. Sprinkle the fresh mozzarella slices over the top of the cantaloupe and prosciutto.
12. Garnish with chopped parsley.

Enjoy your Grilled Cantaloupe with Prosciutto and Mozzarella!

gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
Using the paddle attachment with an electric mixer on low speed, mix together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
Add in butter and mix until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Add in eggs, heavy cream, and almond extract until blended.
Stir in dried cranberries.
Transfer dough to to a well-floured surface and roll out dough 1/2-inch thick.
Using a 3-inch round cookie cutter, cut out pieces of dough and transfer to a nonstick baking sheet.
Knead together any scrapes, roll out and cut out more until all dough is used.
Bake for 13-17 minutes until tops are slightly brown.
Cool on a wire rack.
Combine confectioners sugar and orange juice until smooth.
Drizzle over scones.
Tips: Use really cold butter.
Cut butter into small cubes.
Make sure dough is rolled out on a well-floured surface and continue to add flour to the surface as well as the rolling pin, hands and cutter.
Add almond slivers on top before glaze is set.
pred:
To make delightful Cranberry Almond Scones, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut the chilled butter into small cubes and add it to the dry ingredients. Using your hands or a pastry cutter, mix the butter into the dry ingredients until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and heavy cream together. Add the almond extract and mix well.
5. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry mixture and mix until a dough forms.
6. Fold in the dried cranberries and confectioners sugar.
7. Pour the dough onto a floured surface and pat it into a 1-inch thick disk.
8. Cut the dough into 8 equal portions and shape each portion into a small mound.
9. Place the scones on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the scones for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
11. Remove the scones from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Cranberry Almond Scones!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Lay tostadas in a single layer on a baking sheet and cook for 4 minutes, or until warm.
Heat chicken, beans, and tomatoes (separately) until hot.
Working in layers, divide each of the ingredients between onto plates, separating each layer with a tostada (see the related blog post for pictures).
Start with one tostada, layer on half the chicken and 1/4 of the cheese.
Top with another tostada and half of the black beans.
Add another tostada and half of the tomatoes.
Finally, add the 4th and final tostada, topped with half of the lettuce, avocado, red pepper, and 1/4 of the cheese.
Repeat the entire process on the 2nd plate.
Top with salsa or taco sauce if you desire.
Enjoy!
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the sliced red bell pepper and cook until it is tender.
3. Add the shredded chicken to the skillet and cook until it is fully cooked through. Season the chicken with a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. In a small bowl, mix the Ro*tel tomatoes with the juice.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken, black beans, pepper jack cheese, and the Ro*tel tomato mixture.
6. Spread a layer of the chicken mixture onto each tostada.
7. Top each tostada with a layer of shredded lettuce.
8. Add a slice of avocado on top of the lettuce.
9. Drizzle some extra Ro*tel tomato mixture over the avocado.
10. Bake the tostadas in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

Enjoy your Spicy Chicken Tostadas!

gt:
Heal the oil in a skillet over medium heat; add in the onion and bell pepper; cover, and cook about 5 minutes, until softened.
Add in chili powder, stirring to coat.
Transfer mixture to a slow cooker; add in the lentils, tomatoes, water, tamari, mustard, brown sugar, salt, and pepper; stir to combine.
Cover and cook on LOW for 8 hours.
Serve sloppy-joe style on warmed buns.
pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chopped red bell pepper (or green bell pepper) and cook for another 5 minutes.
4. Add the chili powder, stirring to coat the vegetables evenly.
5. Add the dried brown lentils, stirring to coat them with the oil and chili powder mixture.
6. Pour in the canned tomatoes, water, tamari or soy sauce, prepared mustard, light brown sugar, and salt.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the lentils are tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
8. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
9. Serve the Sloppy Lentils over rice or with your favorite side dish.

[/INST]

gt:
In a saucepan, add sugar and 65 ml water, mix well and bring it to a boil over medium heat.
Add lemon juice, mix well and bring to a boil again.
In another small pan, add 50 ml water to corn flour, mix well, cook over medium heat.
Add 1/2 teaspoon butter and cook until bubbly.
Then gradually add sugar water mixture, mix well.
Then add cinnamon, pineapple essence, and mixed fruit candy.
When the mixture becomes thick, pour onto a greased plate or pan (1x4x6-inch dimensions) and set aside for 2 hours.
Sprinkle chocolate candy over the almost cooled mixture and press it in a bit so that it sticks (you dont want it to melt, so dont put it on too early).
Cut into small pieces (1x1 inch).
Serve and enjoy.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, corn flour, and cinnamon.
3. Add the butter and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the water, lemon juice, and pineapple essence, mixing until smooth.
5. Stir in the mixed fruit candy and chocolate candies.
6. Pour the mixture onto a greased baking sheet or a silicone mat.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
8. Allow the square to cool completely before cutting it into equal squares.

Enjoy your delicious homemade sweet square!

gt:
Pound chicken to 1/4 inch thick
Combined chicken bouillon with bread crumbs in shallow dish
Dip chicken in eggs,then bread crumbs mixture, coating well
Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and cook chicken,turning once,until chicken is thoroughly cooked and golden brown, about 5 mins
Tip:To bake,preheat oven to 425F.
Line baking pan with aluminum foil, then spray with nonstick spray.
Arrange chicken on pan,then lightly spray and with nonstick cooking spray.
Bake 15 mins or until chicken is thoroughly cooked...
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the chicken bouillon with 1 cup of bread crumbs. Set aside.
3. In a separate bowl, lightly beat the 4 eggs.
4. Season the chicken breast with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices.
5. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
6. Dip the chicken breast into the beaten eggs, then coat them with the bread crumb mixture.
7. Carefully place the coated chicken breast into the hot skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until the chicken is cooked through and golden brown.
8. Transfer the cooked chicken to a wire rack placed on a baking sheet.
9. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread crumbs are golden brown and crispy.
10. Serve the Chicken Milanese immediately.

<</SYS>>

[/INST]

gt:
Mix the [A] ingredients together well.
Pierce the breast meat several times with a fork.
This will help the spices permeate the meat better.
Add the mixture from step 1 and the chicken to a plastic bag, get rid of any excess air and seal the bag.
Lightly rub the meat over the plastic bag and leave to rest in the refrigerator for a whole day.
Place the chicken on a lightly oiled baking tray.
If you want to make a red tandoori chicken like you get in Indian restaurants, simply sprinkle over some paprika and blend it into the marinade sauce on the surface.
Bake for 30 minutes in the oven at 200C.
When the outside of the meat is well-browned then it's done.
Try squeezing some lemon juice over the top to taste.
Slice thinly for tandoori chicken ham.
I made a sandwich with the thinly sliced tandoori chicken with sliced onion.
It's very delicious.
I spread a little mayonnaise on bread.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.
3. In a large bowl, mix the yogurt, curry powder, paprika powder, and garlic.
4. Add the chicken breasts to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the marinade.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. Heat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
7. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
8. Place the marinated chicken breasts on the prepared baking sheet.
9. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 74°C (165°F).
10. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
11. Serve the Tandoori Chicken with Curry Powder over a bed of rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

gt:
Heat a 4 quart stockpot over medium heat.
Lightly spray with nonstick cooking spray.
Add carrots, onion and garlic, cook and stir for 2 minutes.
Stir in chicken, lemon zest, lemon juice, soup, broth and black pepper; bring to a boil.
Stir in rice and reduce heat.
Cover and simmer over low heat 15-20 minutes or until rice is tender.
Remove from heat and stir in parsley just before serving.
pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the lemon zest, lemon juice, and cooked chicken to the pot. Stir to combine.
4. Add the rice to the pot, stirring to combine with the chicken and vegetables.
5. Pour in the cream of chicken soup and chicken broth, stirring to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
7. Season the soup with the pepper, stirring to combine.
8. Serve the Greek Lemon Chicken Soup hot, garnished with chopped parsley.

[/INST]

gt:
Set oven to 350.
Grease a 13 x 9" baking pan.
Cream butter, with 1 cup brown sugar.
Stir in oats, wheat flour, white flour, wheat germ and orange zest.
Press mixture into bottom of prepared baking pan.
Combine eggs, almonds, chocolate chips, raisins, coconut, and remaining 1/2 cup brown sugar; mix gently, but thoroughly.
Pour over butter mixture; spread evenly.
Bake for 30-35 minutes.
Cool before cutting into bars.
pred:
To make a delicious Backpacker Bars dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar, and oats. Mix well until the oats are evenly coated with the butter and sugar.
3. Add the whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, wheat germ, and orange zest to the bowl. Mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and then gently fold them into the dry ingredients.
5. Stir in the sliced almonds, chocolate chips (or regular chocolate chips), raisins, and flaked coconut.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the dish comes out clean.
8. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting them into squares and serving.

This delicious Backpacker Bars dish is a perfect treat for those on the go, as it is easy to prepare and pack. The combination of oats, brown sugar, and butter provides a satisfying crunch, while the whole wheat flour and wheat germ add a nutritious boost. The chocolate chips or chocolate chips and raisins add a sweet and fruity touch, while the coconut adds a delightful crunch.

gt:
Cook and drain ground beef.
Add cream of mushroom soup and vegetable soup.
Stir until well mixed.
Serve over rice or noodles.
Pretty easy, cheap and tasty!
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned.
3. Add the onions and cook until softened.
4. Add the mushroom soup and vegetable soup, stirring to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover and cook in the oven for about 30 minutes, or until the beef is tender.
6. Serve the Easy Goulash over cooked noodles or rice.

[/INST]

4. Add the mushroom soup and vegetable soup, stirring to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover and cook in the oven for about 30 minutes, or until the beef is tender.
6. Serve the Easy Goulash over cooked noodles or rice.
