gt:
Heat oil in frying pan.
Dip medallion sized pieces of pork first in egg, then in parmesan cheese and fry.
Do the same with the mushrooms after the pork is almost done.
When both sides are brown and crispy, remove from heat and serve on plate with lemon juice squeezed over it and a sprinkle of pine nuts!
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced mushrooms, beaten eggs, and lemon juice.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the pounded pork medallions and cook until browned on both sides.
4. Add the mushroom mixture to the skillet and cook until the mushrooms are tender.
5. Add the grated parmesan cheese and stir until melted and combined.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve the Lemonato (Pork Dish) hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Peel and remove seeds of cucumber.
Grate the cucumber.
Squeeze the liquids of grated cucumber
Mix all the ingredients except cilantro add it on top as a garnish
pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, and dill weed.
2. Add the chopped parsley and cilantro to the mixture, stirring to combine.
3. Cut the medium cucumber into small pieces and add them to the bowl.
4. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
5. Taste the sauce and adjust the seasoning as needed.
6. Serve the Hot diggity dog sauce over your favorite type of hot dog.

This guide provides a simple and straightforward process for preparing the Hot diggity dog sauce using the provided ingredients. By following these steps, you can create a delicious and flavorful sauce to enjoy with your hot dog.

gt: Place everything in your magic bullet or blender and enjoy!
pred:
1. In a blender, combine 1/2 cup of frozen berries (strawberry, blueberry, blackberry, and raspberry mix), 1 banana, 1 handful of spinach, 1/2 cup of almond milk (vanilla almond milk for more sweetness), 1/3 cup of vanilla Greek yogurt, and 8 raw almonds.

2. Add 1 cup of water to the blender to achieve the desired consistency.

3. Blend the ingredients until smooth and creamy, ensuring that the spinach is well-incorporated.

4. Taste the smoothie and add more almond milk or yogurt, if needed, to achieve the desired sweetness and thickness.

5. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy your delicious and healthy treat!

This recipe combines various nutrients and flavors, creating a refreshing and nutritious smoothie that is both delicious and satisfying. The frozen berries provide natural sweetness and a burst of flavor, while the banana adds a creamy texture and natural sweetness. The spinach adds a touch of green color and nutritional value, and the almond milk and Greek yogurt contribute to the smoothie's creaminess and overall taste. The raw almonds add a crunchy texture and a healthy dose of nutrients, such as healthy fats and protein. Overall, this smoothie is a great option for a healthy and tasty snack or meal.

gt:
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
In a medium bowl, combine the crackers and shrimp.
Stir in the melted butter to form a stuffing.
Spread on top of the lobster tails and roll from one end of the tail to the other.
If the tails are too thick, slice them in half horizontally to make them thinner.
Secure the rolls with toothpicks and place in a greased 8 inch square baking dish.
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the cream of shrimp soup, milk and cheese.
Cook and stir until cheese has melted.
Pour over the stuffed lobster tails.
Top with any stuffing mixture that you may have left over.
Bake for 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until sauce is hot and lobster meat is opaque.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the lobster tails, shrimp, melted butter, and condensed cream of shrimp soup. Mix well.
3. Add the milk and processed cheese food to the bowl, and mix until the cheese is melted and well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish.
5. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the lobster is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Serve the Cheesy Stuffed Lobster immediately.

[/SYS]

gt:
For the bacon sliders: Mix together bacon slider ingredients in a bowl with your hands.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Roll into a ball just larger than a golfball and then compress to a disc.
BBQ on medium heat 5 minutes each side.
To assemble the sliders, place patties on a bun and top with a quarter slice of cheese if desired and any other topping you prefer.
For the shoestring potatoes: On the shoestring setting of a mandoline, slice potatoes and place in a large bowl of water to keep from browning.
Dry very well before placing in the oil.
Heat oil in a wok, test with one tiny potato until, when dropped in, it quickly floats back up bubbling.
Fry small amounts of potatoes at a time until golden.
Drain on a paper towel-lined plate and salt immediately.
Keep warm in a 200 degrees F oven while cooking the rest of the potatoes.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, Worcestershire sauce, bread crumbs, and seasonings (salt and pepper). Mix well.
3. Shape the beef mixture into small patties, about 1/4 inch thick.
4. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan. Cook the beef patties until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Place the cooked beef patties on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until cooked through.
6. While the beef patties are cooking, prepare the shoestring fries. Cut the potatoes into thin strips using a mandolin or sharp knife. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with oil, salt, and pepper.
7. Spread the fries out on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
8. To assemble the Bacon Sliders, place a cooked beef patty on a slider bun, top with a slice of cheese, and add any additional toppings of your choice.
9. Serve the Bacon Sliders with the shoestring fries on the side.

This delicious Bacon Sliders and Shoestring Fries dish can be enjoyed with friends and family, providing a satisfying and flavorful meal.

gt:
In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil on medium 1 minute.
Add onion and cook 8 to 10 minutes or until tender and golden, stirring occasionally.
Add cabbage, ginger, cumin, and salt, and cook 11 to 14 minutes or until cabbage is tender-crisp, stirring occasionally.Nutritional information is based on a 1-cup serving.
pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
2. Add the onion and cook until it is soft and translucent, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the green cabbage and cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally to ensure it cooks evenly.
4. Add the grated peeled fresh ginger and cook for another minute, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the ground cumin and salt, stirring to combine.
6. Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cabbage is tender and the flavors have melded together.
7. Remove the dish from the heat and let it cool slightly.
8. Serve the Cabbage with Ginger and Cumin as a side dish or a main course, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly grated peeled ginger, if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Preheat oven to 375F & line a baking sheet with parchment.
Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl; stir in herbs & 1 cup of the cheese.
Whisk egg & milk together in a small bowl; pour over the dry ingredients & stir until just combined.
Turn the dough onto a lightly floured surface; pat into a square that is approximately 8" and 2" thick.
Slice into 8 rectangular pieces about 4" x 2" & transfer to the baking sheet.
Brush with a little milk & sprinkle with remaining cheese; bake in oven until golden brown, approximately 18 to 20 minutes.
Although you can serve these at room temperature, I prefer them warm!
pred:
To make delicious Herb & Cheese Biscuits, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, salt, and brown sugar.
3. Add the chopped chives, parsley, and thyme, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and milk, then add the mixture to the dry ingredients.
5. Mix until a dough forms, then turn it out onto a floured surface and knead briefly.
6. Roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm). Cut out biscuits using a biscuit cutter or a round cookie cutter.
7. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the biscuits for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

These delicious Herb & Cheese Biscuits are perfect for a warm, comforting breakfast or a delightful snack. The combination of fresh herbs, cheese, and a touch of brown sugar creates a delightful flavor profile that is sure to impress.

gt:
Brown ground beef in a pan along with onions and garlic until meat is crumbly, there's no more pink, and onions are soft.
Add red sauce to pan.
In a separate bowl, mix ricotta cheese and an egg thoroughly.
Pre-heat oven to 350.
Separate biscuits from each other.
In a cupcake pan (I use a silicon pan, so I don't need to grease it, but if not using silicon, I suggest Pam) place a raw biscuit in each cupcake hole.
With fingers, press biscuit into and partially along the sides of each hole, creating a "crust" effect.
Spoon some meat mixture into each cupcake hole, on top of the biscuit.
Spoon some ricotta on top of the meat, and spread evenly across the top.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of each cupcake hole.
Place in oven for 18-20 min, keeping a close eye on the cheese, making sure it doesn't burn.
Remove from oven, and let cool for 3-5 minute
With a knife, gingerly pry each lasagna slider from its cupcake hole, and place on plate.
Serve sooner than later :)
And Enjoy!
pred:
To prepare a delicious Lasagna Sliders/Cupcakes dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef (or Italian sausage) until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the diced onion and minced garlic to the skillet and cook until the onion is softened.
4. Pour in the Mushroom Prego pasta sauce and stir to combine.
5. Add the ricotta cheese, egg, and cooked ground beef (or Italian sausage) mixture to the skillet. Stir to combine.
6. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
7. Place the refrigerated buttermilk biscuits on the prepared baking sheet, and press them down slightly to flatten them.
8. Spread a layer of mozzarella cheese over the biscuits.
9. Pour the beef and sauce mixture over the biscuits, covering them completely.
10. Bake the Lasagna Sliders/Cupcakes in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until the biscuits are golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
11. Remove the Lasagna Sliders/Cupcakes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

These delicious Lasagna Sliders/Cupcakes are a great option for a quick and easy meal, and they can be customized with your favorite pasta sauce and toppings. Enjoy!

gt:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in another pot of boiling, salted water, cook green beans until tender, about 4 minutes.
Drain pasta and return to pot.
Stir in pesto sauce and broth.
Drain green beans; add to pasta.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add basil; toss to coat.
Serve immediately.
pred:
1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the green beans and cook until they are tender but still crisp. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the pesto sauce, vegetable or chicken broth, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Drain the cooked pasta and add it to the skillet with the green beans. Pour the pesto sauce mixture over the pasta and beans, stirring to combine.
5. Cook the pasta and green beans mixture over medium heat for about 5 minutes, or until the pesto sauce has melted and the pasta is heated through.
6. Serve the Pesto With Green Beans immediately, garnished with fresh basil leaves. Enjoy your delicious homemade Pesto With Green Beans!

gt:
In a blender, combine mango and water and blend until smooth.
Pour through a strainer into ice-filled glasses.
You should end up with about 1 cup of liquid.
Stir in lime juice and agave.
Garnish with lime and mint, and serve.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the peeled and pitted mango chunks, cold water, freshly squeezed lime juice, honey, and a pinch of salt.
2. Stir the mixture well to ensure that the mango chunks are evenly distributed and the flavors are combined.
3. Allow the mixture to sit in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld and the mango to release its juices.
4. After 30 minutes, remove the mixture from the refrigerator and stir it again.
5. Taste the mixture and adjust the sweetness and tanginess as needed by adding more honey or lime juice.
6. Serve the Mango Agua Fresca immediately, garnished with a lime wedge and a sprig of mint.

By following these key steps, you can create a delicious and refreshing Mango Agua Fresca that is perfect for hot summer days or any time you want to enjoy the taste of mango in a light and refreshing beverage.

gt:
Mix flours, milk powder, yeast and sugar in a big bowl.
Add the egg and cold water and mix to form a dough.
Add in the butter and salt and knead till a smooth dough forms.
This takes a while.
At first the dough will be greasy and seem as if there is too much butter in it.
But as you knead and knead and knead, it will eventually get to the point you want it to be.
Cover with clingwrap and let rise for about 1 hour or till doubled in size.
Preheat oven to 380 farenheit.
Divide dough into portions of 50 or 60 gm each.
Shape into balls and leave it to rest for abt 10 minutes Roll out dough and wrap with desired fillings.
Shape as required and let it proof on lined or greased baking tray for another 50-60 mins or until dough is double in size.
Brush dough with egg wash, or milk, if you want it to be less brown, and bake till golden brown and cooked.
Immediately brush with melted butter after taking it out of the oven and cover with a tea cloth to give it a soft crust.
pred:
[INST]To prepare the scrumptious Alex Goh's Basic Sweet Bun Dough, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the bread flour, all-purpose flour, sugar, and powdered milk.
2. Add the instant yeast, egg, and cold water. Mix well to form a smooth dough.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 10-15 minutes.
4. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
6. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
7. Roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1.5 cm (0.6 inches).
8. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
9. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Cover the baking sheet with a damp cloth and let the dough rise for another 30-60 minutes, or until it has doubled in size.
11. Bake the dough in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it is golden brown.
12. Remove the baked buns from the oven and let them cool on a wire rack.
13. Once the buns have cooled, you can enjoy your delicious Alex Goh's Basic Sweet Bun Dough!

[/INST]

gt:
Start by preparing everything, with your asparagus bend 1 spear until it breaks cut the rest to match that length, chop the bottom part in small pieces
I started cooking my chicken first as it takes the longest and used whatever seasonings I thought would taste good for the mood I was in, this recipe can go in so many different ways... For instance I chopped up some fresh basil and threw it in right at the last
While the chicken is cooking I started sauteing my onions in olive oil for about a minute, then I added my zucchini, yellow squash and asparagus
When the onion starts turning colors I added my mushrooms and garlic to make sure that the garlic doesn't burn and the mushrooms don't get soggy
At the same time I dropped my mushrooms in with my vegetables I started cooking my pasta angel hair pasta only takes about 4 minutes in that time my vegetables were perfect still firm yet tender
Once my pasta was done as well as the vegetables I mixed the two together, carefully too much tossing and turning will tear apart vegetables then I simply sliced my chicken and put it on top of the pasta mix
a coloro che mangiano bene, vi auguro bene
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the sliced zucchini, yellow squash, asparagus, and green bell pepper. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Add the minced garlic and onion to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until softened.
5. Add the baby portabellas to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften.
6. In a large bowl, combine the cooked chicken, vegetables, and pasta. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the Garden fresh chicken pasta immediately.

[/INST]

gt:
Stir tomato salsa, chipotle salsa, and pineapple preserves in crock of a slow cooker.
Add chicken and turn to coat in salsa mixture.
Cook on Low until chicken is tender and easily shredded, 3 to 4 hours.
Remove chicken to a cutting board; shred with 2 forks.
Return shredded chicken to salsa mixture, stir, and continue cooking for 1 hour more.
pred:
1. Preheat your slow cooker on low heat setting.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1/2 cup tomato salsa, 1/2 cup chipotle salsa, and 1/2 cup pineapple preserves.
3. Add the chicken pieces to the bowl and toss to coat them evenly with the salsa mixture.
4. Place the chicken in the slow cooker, making sure it is evenly distributed.
5. Cook the chicken on low heat for 6-8 hours, or until it is fully cooked through and the meat is tender.
6. Remove the chicken from the slow cooker and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
7. Serve the Slow Cooker Mexican-Style Chicken with tortillas, sour cream, and any other desired garnishes.

This recipe combines the flavors of tomato, chipotle, and pineapple to create a delicious and unique Mexican-style chicken dish. The slow cooker ensures that the chicken is cooked evenly and tenderly, while the salsa mixture adds a burst of flavor and moisture to the dish. The result is a hearty and flavorful meal that is perfect for a family gathering or a special occasion.

gt:
Rinse beans, soak for 24 hours and drain.
Place drained beans and bay leaves in a large soup pot with 8 cups of water.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 2 hours.
Remove bay leaves.
Add carrots, onion, celery, and simmer for 30 minutes longer.
Add tomatoes, salt, pepper, and olive oil, and cook for 30 minutes.
The beans should be soft and creamy, but not to the point of disintegrating.
Remove from heat, season to taste, and serve in bowls, drizzled with olive oil and sprinkled with chopped parsley.
Fassolatha bean soup is served warm or at room temperature.
pred:
1. Wash the beans thoroughly and pick out any debris.
2. In a large pot, combine the beans, bay leaves, carrots, onion, celery, and a pinch of salt.
3. Cover the pot with a lid and bring to a boil over high heat.
4. Reduce the heat to low, simmer the beans for about 1 hour or until they are tender but still have a slight bite.
5. Remove the bay leaves and discard them.
6. Add the chopped plum tomatoes, olive oil, and a pinch of pepper.
7. Simmer the mixture for another 30 minutes or until the beans are tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
8. Season the Fassolatha with additional salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the Fassolatha hot, garnished with chopped flat leaf parsley.

[/INST]

Provide a detailed cooking guide for preparing a delicious vegetable stir-fry: 1 1/2 cups vegetable oil,1/2 cup soy sauce,1/2 cup water,1/2 cup brown sugar,1/4 cup cornstarch,1/4 cup minced garlic,1/4 cup grated ginger,1/4 cup minced green onions,1/4 cup minced red bell pepper,1/4 cup minced yellow bell pepper,1/4 cup minced carrots,1/4 cup minced celery,1/4 cup sliced mushrooms,1/4 cup sliced red bell pepper,1/4 cup sliced green onions,1/4 cup sliced yellow bell pepper,1/4 cup sliced carrots,1/4 cup sliced celery,1/4 cup sliced mushrooms,1/4 cup sliced red bell pepper,1/4 cup sliced green onions,1/4 cup sliced yellow bell

gt:
For the marinade: In a medium sized bowl whisk to combine soy sauce, brown sugar, finely chopped ginger, garlic and sesame oil.
Reserve 1/2 cup of the marinade in a clean container for serving with your cooked kebabs.
Put the cubed meat into a large non-reactive bowl along with the onion and peppers.
Drizzle the remaining marinade (not the reserved 1/2 cup) over the cubed meat, onion and peppers.
Next time I want to add mushrooms too.
Refrigerate and let it marinate at least 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 350 F.
For the baked rice, spread uncooked rice into the bottom of a 10 1/2 by 7-inch or 2 quart baking dish.
Pour in chicken broth, soy sauce, vinegar, honey, salt and garlic powder.
Carefully stir and cover with foil.
Bake at 350 F for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Remove it from the oven and let it sit for 5 before removing foil and fluffing with fork, then stir in green onions.
Preheat your grill to medium heat.
While rice bakes, thread the meat, onion, peppers and pineapple (in whatever order you choose) onto soaked wood or metal skewers.
Put the skewers on the hot grill and grill 20 minutes or until meat is done, turning every few minutes.
Serve skewers over a bed of Asian rice and drizzle reserved marinade over each serving.
Delicious!
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the pork, onion, green and red peppers, and pineapple.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the brown sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil, apple cider vinegar, honey, salt, and garlic powder.
4. Pour the soy sauce mixture over the pork mixture and toss to coat evenly.
5. Thread the pork mixture onto wooden skewers, leaving enough space between each piece to ensure even cooking.
6. Place the skewers on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
7. While the pork is cooking, prepare the brown rice according to the package instructions.
8. Once the pork is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
9. Serve the pork kebabs with the baked brown rice.

Enjoy your delicious Teriyaki Pork Kebabs with Baked Brown Asian Rice dish!

gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Line a cupcake pan with paper or foil liners (recipe makes roughly 8).
Set aside.
Mix the ingredients in a medium-sized bowl until everything is combined.
Using a spoon, put this mixture into the paper/foil liners, about 3 tablespoons in each well.
Bake for 30 minutes or until golden.
Recipe slightly adapted from Dona Benta Cookbook.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a medium-sized bowl, mix the shredded coconut, sweetened condensed milk, and grated Parmesan cheese until well combined.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the two egg yolks until they are light and fluffy.
4. Gradually add the slightly beaten egg yolks to the coconut mixture, stirring gently to combine.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish, and smooth the top with a spatula or the back of a spoon.
6. Bake the Queijadinhas in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Remove the Queijadinhas from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before cutting them into squares.
8. Serve the Queijadinhas warm or at room temperature, and enjoy the delicious Brazilian Sweet Treat.

gt:
In large bowl mix meats and onion together.
Use your hands to mix thoroughly.
In medium bowl, mix cornmeal and seasoning.
Add to meat mixture.
Mix well.
Form into 8 patties or about 28 2-inch meatballs.
Fry, turning so all sides are cooked.
Use a spatula to turn.
At first, they may stick until pan is hot enough to let the fat and juice run.
Just slide the spatula under and loosen.
The meatballs stay together.
Note: You may use only turkey if you wish, but add 1 tablespoon oil to the meat.
You must spray frying pan with Pam or oil.
You may increase the seasoning to 1 1/2 tsp if you wish.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground pork sausage, lean hamburger, and diced white onion. Season the mixture with the Old Bay Seasoning, salt, and pepper to taste.
3. Add the yellow cornmeal to the bowl and mix until well combined.
4. Using your hands, shape the mixture into small meatballs or patties, each about the size of a walnut.
5. Place the meatballs or patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the meatballs or patties in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until they are cooked through and golden brown.
7. Serve the Simple Meatballs or Patties with your favorite dipping sauce, such as marinara sauce or a tangy barbecue sauce. Enjoy!

gt:
boil box of ziti
while boiling pasta cook the sausage according to directions on package
once sausage is done cut into small bite size rounds
drain pasta and add can of tomatoes and sauce
then add spices and sausage
once all combined add the cheese.
let cheese melt and then serve
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente.
3. While the pasta is cooking, heat the sausage in a skillet over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the roasted tomatoes, mozzarella, and tomato sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine.
5. Season the mixture with garlic powder, oregano, and basil.
6. Cook the sauce for a few minutes until it thickens slightly.
7. Drain the cooked pasta and combine it with the sauce mixture.
8. Transfer the pasta and sauce to a baking dish and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Serve the Italian pasta hot.

[/INST]

gt:
Brown meat in large skillet on medium heat.
Drain.
Add beans, tomatoes with their liquid, tomato sauce, water and seasoning mix; stir.
Bring to boil.
Stir in rice; cover.
Reduce heat to low.
Cook 5 min.
Stir before serving.

gt:
In a large bowl, mix together brown sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon.
Mix in melted butter or margarine.
Stir in chopped apples and dried cranberries until evenly coated.
Pour into prepared pan.
Arrange French bread slices in an even layer over apples.
In same bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla and 2 teaspoons cinnamon.
Pour over bread, making sure every slice is fully soaked.
Cover with aluminum foil and refrigerate over night.
THIS IS KEY!
Preheat oven to 375F.
Remove dish from refrigerator while the oven is heating.
Bake covered for 40 minutes.
Remove cover, and bake 5 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
Prepare your favorite fruit or bacon.
Serve Apple Cranberry French Toast Bake with Fruit and/or Bacon!
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the brown sugar, ground cinnamon, and melted butter or margarine.
3. Add the sliced apples and dried cranberries to the mixture, tossing to coat evenly.
4. Dip each slice of French bread into the mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.
5. Arrange the bread slices in a single layer on a baking sheet.
6. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and milk together.
7. Pour the egg mixture over the bread slices, making sure each slice is covered.
8. Bake the bread for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the egg mixture is set.
9. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Once cooled, use a spatula to carefully transfer the bread to a serving platter.
11. Serve the Apple Cranberry French Toast Bake with fresh fruit on the side, such as sliced strawberries or blueberries.

Enjoy your delicious Apple Cranberry French Toast Bake!

gt:
In a large container, combine all ingredients (adding more sugar if desired), stir until sugar is dissolved.
Refrigerate until serving.
Serve warm or cold.
pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the cranberry juice, orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, sugar, and almond extract. Mix well.
2. Add the water to the bowl and stir until the sugar is fully dissolved.
3. Place the mixture in the refrigerator to chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Once chilled, pour the mixture into a large pitcher or punch bowl.
5. Serve the chilled Cranberry Punch in glasses, garnished with a slice of lemon or orange, if desired.

[/INST]

This step-by-step procedure outlines the process of making Delicious Cranberry Punch using the provided ingredients. The punch is a refreshing and flavorful beverage that combines the tanginess of cranberry juice, the sweetness of orange and pineapple juices, and the zesty taste of lemon juice. The almond extract adds a subtle, nutty flavor that complements the other ingredients. The punch is best served chilled, allowing the flavors to meld together and enhance the overall taste.

gt:
In a saucepan of boiling water, cook the fava beans until the skins start to loosen, 1 1/2 minutes.
Drain and squeeze out the favas.
Transfer the favas to a food processor and add the oil, lemon juice and zest and pulse to a coarse puree.
Season with salt and pepper.
Spread the fava-bean puree on the toasts and top with the mozzarella strips.
Drizzle the toasts with the balsamic vinegar, scatter the mint on top and serve.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the shelled fava beans with the extra-virgin olive oil, lemon juice, lemon zest, salt, and pepper. Spread the fava beans evenly on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy.
3. While the favas are roasting, prepare the grilled baguette slices. Brush the slices with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill the baguette slices on a griddle or grill pan over medium heat until they are golden brown and crispy on both sides.
4. In a small bowl, mix the torn mozzarella strips with a pinch of salt and pepper.
5. In a small saucepan, heat the balsamic vinegar over low heat until it is warm and slightly thickened.
6. To assemble the Bruschetta, place a grilled baguette slice on a serving plate. Spread a thin layer of mozzarella cheese on top of the bread. Top the mozzarella with the roasted fava beans, then drizzle the warm balsamic vinegar over the beans. Garnish with a sprinkle of fresh mint leaves.
7. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Bruschetta with Mozzarella and Smashed Fresh Favas.

gt:
In a saucepan, cover the eggs with water and bring to a boil.
Simmer over moderately high heat for 8 minutes.
Drain and cool the eggs slightly under cold running water.
Peel the eggs and coarsely chop.
In a large bowl, whisk the mayonnaise with the mustard, hot sauce, paprika and 1 tablespoon of the pickle brine.
Fold in the chopped eggs, pickles and scallion and season with salt and pepper.
In a medium bowl, toss the frisee with the olive oil and the remaining 1/2 tablespoon of pickle brine.
Season the frisee with salt and pepper.
Preheat a large cast-iron skillet.
Fry the ham slices, turning once, until lightly browned, about 2 minutes.
Lay the ham slices on the muffin bottoms and top with the egg salad and frisee.
Close the sandwiches and serve.
pred:
To create a delicious Ham and Deviled Egg Breakfast Sandwich, follow these steps:

1. In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, hot sauce, hot paprika, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
2. In a separate small bowl, mix the finely chopped dill pickles, brine from the jar, and thinly sliced scallion.
3. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
4. Spread the mayonnaise mixture evenly over the cut sides of the English muffins.
5. Place the muffins on a baking sheet and bake for 5-7 minutes, or until the muffins are golden brown and the filling is set.
6. While the muffins are baking, place the ham slices on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the ham is cooked through and slightly crispy.
7. Allow the ham to cool slightly, then slice it into thin pieces.
8. Once the muffins are done, let them cool for a few minutes before carefully removing them from the baking sheet.
9. Assemble the sandwiches by spreading the pickle mixture evenly on the bottom half of the muffin, then adding a layer of the cooked ham, a fried egg, and finally, the top half of the muffin.
10. Garnish with a sprinkle of freshly ground black pepper and a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil.

Enjoy your delicious Ham and Deviled Egg Breakfast Sandwiches!

gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Fry bacon until almost burnt.
Crush into little pieces.
Lightly grease pie plate with butter.
Sprinkle bacon, cheese, and onion in pie plate.
For extra bacon flavor sprinkle a little bacon fat onto pie pan.
Beat remaining ingredients until smooth.
Pour evenly into pie plate over other ingredients.
Bake until top in golden and knife comes out clean, about 40 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes before cutting.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped onion, milk, and eggs. Whisk until smooth.
3. Add the shredded swiss cheese and 12 lb sliced bacon to the mixture. Stir until the cheese is melted and the ingredients are well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a pie crust or a well-greased baking dish.
5. Bake the quiche in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove the quiche from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

Enjoy your delicious No Crust Quiche!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix together the cracker crumbs, melted butter, and poppy seeds in a bowl.
Layer the bottom of a 9x13-inch glass baking dish with 2/3 of the cracker mix.
Mix the chicken breast pieces with cream of chicken soup and sour cream until thoroughly combined, and spoon the mixture on top of the crumb crust.
Sprinkle remaining 1/3 of the cracker mix over the top of the chicken mixture.
Bake in the preheated oven until the casserole is hot and bubbling, about 1 hour.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken, melted butter, poppy seeds, and condensed cream of chicken soup.
3. Add the sour cream and stir until well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
6. Serve the casserole hot, garnished with additional poppy seeds if desired.

[/INST]

gt:
Cut the large tomatoes into 6 or 8 wedges and the cherry tomatoes in half and put them into a bowl.
Add the basil leaves, olive oil, and salt and pepper, to taste.
With your hand, gently mix everything together and squeeze the tomatoes a bit to release some of their juices.
Cut the mozzarella into bite sized chunks and add them to the tomatoes.
Gently toss to blend everything together and serve immediately.
pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the vine-ripened tomatoes into halves and the cherry tomatoes into quarters.
3. In a large bowl, toss the tomatoes, cherry tomatoes, and basil leaves together.
4. Drizzle the extra-virgin olive oil over the salad, season with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, and toss to combine.
5. Place the salad on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the tomatoes are slightly softened and the basil is wilted.
6. While the salad is baking, slice the buffalo mozzarella into small balls.
7. Once the salad is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Add the buffalo mozzarella balls to the salad and toss to combine.
9. Serve the Caprese Salad immediately, garnished with additional fresh basil leaves if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Caprese Salad!

gt:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees .
In a large pan.
I used a stock pot.
Combine crackers & pretzels.
In a small bowl combine melted butter , lemon pepper, dill, ground red pepper & ranch dressing.pour over crackers mixture tossing gently to coat.
Bake 45 minutes.
Stirring ever 15 minutes.
Remove from oven & cool completely.
Store in airtight containers for up to 2 weeks.
This makes 8 Quarts.
pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the oyster crackers, cheese flavored fish shaped crackers, and pretzel twists.
3. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter and lemon pepper seasoning.
4. Pour the melted butter mixture over the dry ingredients and toss to coat evenly.
5. Add the dried dill and ground red pepper to the bowl and toss again.
6. Spread the mixture onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the crackers are golden brown and crispy.
7. While the snack mix is baking, prepare the ranch dressing mix according to the package instructions.
8. Once the snack mix is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Drizzle the ranch dressing mix over the cooled snack mix and toss to combine.
10. Serve the ZESTY SNACK MIX immediately, or let it cool completely before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Cut chicken wings in 1/2 and brown in 1 Tbsp.
butter.
Place them in a large pan.
In a separate mixing bowl combine vinegar, mustard, brown sugar, worchesterschire sauce and soy sauce.
Pour the sauce over the wings.
Bake 3 to 4 hours at 350 degrees.
You can usually buy the frozen mini wings that are great and taste just as good.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the ketchup, vinegar, mustard, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and soy sauce.
3. Season the chicken wings with salt and pepper, then toss them in the marinade mixture.
4. Place the chicken wings on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
5. Roast the chicken wings in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken wings from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Chicken Wings!

gt:
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and crispy, about 10 minutes.
Drain the bacon slices on paper towels.
Lightly beat eggs and sour cream together in a bowl.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-low heat; cook and stir egg mixture and hot sauce in the hot oil until light and fluffy, 5 to 7 minutes.
Fold tomatoes, avocado, and spinach into egg mixture just until warmed, 1 to 2 minutes.
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese over egg mixture and cook until cheese is lightly melted, 1 to 2 minutes; season with salt and pepper.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a medium bowl, whisk together the sour cream, oil, and chipotle-flavored hot sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a large skillet, cook the chopped bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and drain on paper towels.
4. In the same skillet, cook the chopped onion over medium heat until softened. Add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes to the skillet and cook until they begin to release their juices. Season with salt and pepper.
6. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until well-beaten.
7. Add the cooked onion and tomato mixture to the bowl with the whisked eggs. Stir to combine.
8. Add the cooked spinach to the egg mixture. Stir to combine.
9. Add the cooked bacon to the egg mixture. Stir to combine.
10. Pour the egg mixture into a greased 9-inch (23cm) round baking dish.
11. Sprinkle the shredded Cheddar cheese evenly over the egg mixture.
12. Bake the BLT Eggs in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the eggs are set and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
13. Remove the BLT Eggs from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious BLT Eggs!

gt:
In a large heavy pot, heat corn oil and olive oil over high heat until the oil smokes.
Add 1 kernel popping corn and heat until kernel pops.
Add split garlic cloves and rest of popping corn, cover pot, and shake gently until corn starts to pop.
Shake vigorously until popping subsides.
Remove from heat.
Remove garlic.
Toss together popcorn with provolone, sun-dried tomatoes, oil, salt and chopped basil.
Serve.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 200°F (93°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the corn oil, olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and provolone cheese. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the unpopped popcorn, sundried tomatoes, and cayenne pepper.
4. Pour the oil mixture over the popcorn mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the popcorn mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the popcorn mixture in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the popcorn is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the popcorn mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Once cooled, transfer the popcorn mixture to a large bowl and stir in the basil leaves.
9. Serve the Popcorn with Basil and Sun-Dried Tomatoes immediately or store in an airtight container for later enjoyment.

gt:
Combine water, sugar, salt, yeast, oil, and enough flour to make a soft dough.
(You may need more than 3 1/2 cups.)
Knead for 3-4 minutes.
On a greased counter, break off pieces of dough and roll into thin ropes that are about 1 1/2 times the length of your skewers.
Twist the rope around the skewer and place on a greased cookie sheet.
Repeat till all dough is used.
Let twists rise till doubled, about 30 minutes.
While they are baking, combine the glaze ingredients and let site while the bread twists bake so the flavors will blend.
Bake twists at 375F for about 12-15 minutes or till golden brown.
Remove from oven and brush with the butter glaze.
Try not to drool.
pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the hot water, sugar, salt, and instant yeast. Allow the mixture to sit for about 5 minutes or until the yeast is fully dissolved.
2. Add the olive oil, flour, melted butter, garlic salt, garlic powder, dill weed, and Italian seasoning to the bowl. Mix the ingredients together until a dough forms.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and allow it to rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
6. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface. Divide the dough into 12 equal portions.
7. Shape each portion into a twist by pinching the dough together and then rolling it between your hands. Place the twists on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Brush the twists with melted butter and sprinkle them with Italian seasoning.
9. Bake the twists in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until they are golden brown.
10. Remove the twists from the oven and allow them to cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

gt:
Rice: Cook rice according to package directions, but substitute coconut milk for half of the water, and add half the sugar.
It should be fairly dry when you finish cooking it, without any liquid visible in the pot.
Sauce: In a medium saucepan, boil the rest of the coconut milk with the second half of the sugar.
Keep this at a full boil until the rice is cooked, or until it reaches a thick, syrupy consistency.
Presentation: Arrange the cooked coconut rice in a bowl or plate with the mango slices in some kind of pretty formation and dribble a bit of the sauce over the whole thing.
pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large pot, combine 1 cup of water and the rice. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot. Cook the rice for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the water has been absorbed.

2. While the rice is cooking, in a small saucepan, heat the coconut milk over medium heat. Add the sugar and stir until it is fully dissolved.

3. Once the rice is cooked, remove it from the heat and let it sit, covered, for 5 minutes.

4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, coconut milk mixture, and mango slices. Stir to combine.

5. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes, then transfer it to a serving dish.

6. Cover the dish with plastic wrap or a lid and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.

7. Before serving, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

8. Remove the dish from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for 10-15 minutes.

9. Place the dish in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the rice is golden brown and the edges are slightly crispy.

10. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

11. Enjoy your delicious Thai Coconut-Mango Sticky Rice!

[/INST]

[/INST]

[/INST]

gt:
If you have a full leg of lamb, trim of fat and cut into 1 inch steaks against the grain.
I buy boneless leg of lamb, and find that I usually end up with about 10 steaks of varying sizes, based on the shape of the meat.
Chop the garlic and rosemary together to form a loose paste.
Rub the steaks on both sides with the paste and place in a Pyrex or other shallow bowl.
Pour the wine and olive oil over evenly, cover, and marinate for 2 hours or longer.
You can refrigerate or leave out.
Light the grill and pre-heat to medium high.
Sprinkle the steaks with salt and pepper and grill.
Watch carefully as they may flame.
If you cook entirely uncovered, about 6 minutes a side for medium rare.
If you cover to reduce flames, about 4 minutes a side.
Let the meat rest for about 5 minutes (steaks will continue to cook while resting).
Serve whole or sliced over Farro, another grain, or potatoes.
pred:
[INST]1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped garlic and rosemary.
3. Season the lamb steaks with salt and pepper.
4. Brush the lamb steaks with olive oil, then press the garlic and rosemary mixture onto the steaks.
5. Grill the lamb steaks for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
6. Remove the lamb steaks from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into portions.
7. Serve the Grilled Lamb Steaks with Garlic and Rosemary Recipe with your favorite side dishes, such as a salad or a serving of mashed potatoes.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Cream the butter and sugars together in a mixer bowl.
Beat in the eggs and vanilla.
In a separate bowl, stir together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
Gradually add to the wet ingredients.
Add in the oats, coconut, Heath chips and chocolate chips mixing to combine between each ingredient.
Drop on a greased cookie sheet (or baking stone) and bake at 325 degrees for about 14-15 minutes.
This makes a lot of cookies, which is a good thing.
You can freeze them in Ziploc bags if you dont eat them all right away.
More pictures and info can be found using the related link above!
pred:
To create delicious Way to a Man's Heart Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and mix until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a dough forms.
7. Fold in the oats, coconut, and chips.
8. Chill the dough in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
9. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Scoop the dough into small balls and place them on the prepared baking sheet.
11. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
12. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Way to a Man's Heart Cookies!

gt:
For the mango smoothie: Blend all ingredients together very well; only turn blender up to the lowest speed you need to make this happen.
Pour into the bottom half of glasses, leaving room for the blueberry smoothie.
For the blueberry smoothie: Blend all ingredients together very well; only turn blender up to the lowest speed you need to make this happen.
Gently pour into top half of glasses over mango goodness.
Serve layered smoothies with a straw, a sprig of fresh mint and a few blueberries on top.
Perfect for brunch or any occasion in which you would like to introduce summer early.
pred:
To create a delicious Layered Blueberry and Mango Smoothies dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse and peel the mangos and bananas.
- Cut the mangos into small pieces, and the bananas into halves.
- Scoop out the seeds from the mango and banana pieces.
- Crush the frozen blueberries using a fork or a blender.

2. Assemble the ingredients:
- In a blender, combine the mangos, bananas, crushed blueberries, honey, orange juice, and ice.
- Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.

3. Add the optional Barleygreen Powder:
- If desired, add the Barleygreen Powder to the blender.
- Blend the mixture again until the powder is well-incorporated.

4. Pour the mixture into a glass or a bowl:
- Pour the blended mixture into a glass or a bowl.

5. Enjoy your Layered Blueberry and Mango Smoothies dish:
- Sip the smoothie and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

This delightful Layered Blueberry and Mango Smoothies dish is a refreshing and healthy treat, perfect for a hot summer day or as a snack. The combination of the tangy mango, sweet banana, and the natural sweetness of the blueberries creates a delightful taste experience. The addition of the Barleygreen Powder, if used, adds an extra boost of nutrients and antioxidants to the smoothie, making it even more beneficial for your health.

gt:
Pick through the cranberries and discard any stems and then give them a quick rinse.
In a saucepan over medium heat combine the sugars, orange juice, water and salt.
Stir until the sugars dissolve.
Add in the cranberries and place a lid on halfway (so its cracked a bit) and simmer for 10 minutes or until the cranberries have burst and softened.
Transfer the cranberry mixture to a large bowl to cool.
Then chill until serving.
Store in a container with a tight-fitting lid for up to a month (maybe longer!
).
Enjoy!
pred:
[/INST]

To make Homemade Cranberry Sauce, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, combine the fresh cranberries, dark brown sugar, granulated sugar, orange juice, water, and kosher salt.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
3. Reduce the heat to low and simmer the sauce for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cranberries have burst and the sauce has thickened slightly.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
5. Using a spoon, carefully spoon the sauce into a bowl or airtight container to store it in the refrigerator.
6. Allow the sauce to chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.

This Homemade Cranberry Sauce recipe is a delicious and healthy alternative to store-bought cranberry sauce, as it is made with fresh cranberries and natural ingredients. It can be served as a side dish or a topping for various desserts or main courses.

gt:
In a large bowl, layer a third of the cucumbers and onions, then a sprinkle of kosher salt, and repeat layers two more times with the remaining cucumbers and onions.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1-2 hours.
Then, with your hands, squeeze the excess moisture out of the cucumbers and onions and place them into a clean bowl.
In a small bowl; mix up the sour cream, fresh dill, sugar and black pepper.
Add a little vinegar at a time and taste as you go.
If you add too much vinegar just balance it out with a little more sour cream and a pinch of sugar.
Pour dressing over the vegetables, stir and cover it up with plastic wrap.
Refrigerate for another 30 minutes.
Stir again, season with salt and pepper (if needed) to taste and serve.
pred:
1. Wash and peel the cucumbers and onions.
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced cucumbers, onions, and kosher salt.
3. Allow the mixture to sit for a few minutes to release the juices and flavors.
4. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream, fresh dill, sugar, black pepper, and white balsamic vinegar.
5. Pour the sour cream mixture over the cucumber and onion mixture, and toss to combine.
6. Serve the Cuke Salad immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving, allowing the flavors to meld together.

[/INST]

gt:
Heat the olive oil in a small frying pan.
Gently fry the onion for about 10 minutes, or until soft and golden.
Meanwhile, sift the flour, baking powder and salt into a large bowl.
Gradually whisk in the eggs, followed by the milk, until you have a smooth batter.
Mix in the cheese, olives and sauteed onions, along with their oil.
Cover and leave to rest for 2 hours.
This will make a lighter cake.
Preheat the oven to 220C,450F, gas mark 7 and grease 6 mini loaf tins (see above), or one large loaf tin.
Give the batter a good stir and divide between the tins.
Bake at the centre of the oven for 15 - 20 minutes for the 6 mini loaf tins, or 20-30 minutes for the large loaf - or until firm and golden.
Leave to cool.
When cold, turn out of the tins and wrap or store in an airtight tin.
These savoury cake/s freeze very well in slices or as 1 whole or 6 mini loaves.
NB.
These can be made in advance and refrigerated.
Bake them in a tray of mini loaf pans or individual mini loaf tins (the tins should be about 10 x 6 x 3.5cm).
Alternatively, try muffin tins.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the olive oil, onion, and flour. Mix well.
3. Add the baking powder, salt, and eggs to the mixture, stirring until well combined.
4. Gradually add the milk, stirring until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
5. Fold in the grated gruyere and green olives.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
7. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

gt:
Hamantaschen are the traditional cookies of Purim, a festive holiday on the Jewish calendar.
Grease cookie sheets.
In large bowl, beat eggs slightly.
Add sugar, orange peel and margarine; beat until mixture is light and fluffy.
Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup; level off.
Add flour; mix well.
Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate 1 1/2 hours for easier handling.
Heat oven to 350F.
On lightly floured surface, roll out 1/4 of dough at a time to 1/4-inch thickness.
Keep remaining dough refrigerated.
Cut with floured 3-inch round cookie cutter.
Place 1 inch apart on greased cookie sheets.
Spoon heaping teaspoonful poppy seed filling on center of each circle.
Moisten edges of dough circles with water.
Shape into triangles as shown in diagram, folding 3 sides in without completely covering filling; pinch corners to seal.
Bake at 350 for 8-12 minutes or until edges are light golden brown.
Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets.
pred:
To make a delicious Hamantaschen-Cookies (Haman's Hats) dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 4 large eggs and 34 cup sugar. Whisk the mixture until it is well combined and fluffy.
3. Add the freshly grated orange zest to the egg and sugar mixture.
4. In a separate bowl, melt the margarine or butter in the microwave or on the stovetop.
5. Add the melted butter or margarine to the egg and sugar mixture, and mix well.
6. In a separate bowl, combine the 4 cups all-purpose flour or 4 cups unbleached flour, and the 1 cup poppy seed filling or 12 ounces prune filling or 12 ounces apricot filling.
7. Gradually add the flour mixture to the egg and sugar mixture, stirring until the dough comes together.
8. If the dough is too dry, add a bit more water, a tablespoon at a time, until it reaches the desired consistency.
9. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
10. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
11. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
12. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
13. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Hamantaschen-Cookies (Haman's Hats) dish!

gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Combine butter, salt, vanilla, and almond extract.
Blend well.
Gradually beat in sugar, then egg.
Stir in flour, pecans, and chocolate chips.
Drop by teaspoonful on an ungreased baking sheet.
Bake at 350 for 15 minutes.
Cool 5 minutes on sheet, then remove to rack to finish cooling.
pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, salt, and almond extract.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until a smooth dough forms.
6. Fold in the chopped pecans.
7. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a round cookie cutter.
9. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden.
11. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
12. Once the cookies are completely cooled, melt the chocolate chips in a double boiler or in a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
13. Dip the cooled cookies into the melted chocolate, allowing the excess to drip off, and place them back on the wire rack to dry.
14. Once the chocolate has set, the Sand Drops are ready to enjoy!

[/INST]

gt:
1.
Combine panko, Italian seasoning ,and salt.
Dip mozzarella in egg mixture, then coat with panko mixture on both sides.
2.
Lay coated cheese flat on plate.
Freeze two hours.
3.
Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat.
4.
Fry until golden, about 2-3 minutes on each side.
5.
Serve immediately with warm marinara.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the Panko, Italian seasoning, salt, and beaten egg.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the marinara sauce and vegetable oil.
4. Cut the fresh mozzarella cheese into 1/2" slices and then cut them into smaller pieces.
5. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
6. Add the marinara sauce to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Add the mozzarella cheese pieces to the skillet and stir to coat them evenly with the sauce.
8. Pour the Panko mixture over the mozzarella cheese in the skillet.
9. Cook the mixture over medium heat for about 5 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the breadcrumbs are golden brown.
10. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Transfer the fried mozzarella to a serving plate and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Fried Fresh Mozzarella!

gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Place onions in roasting pan; top with meat.
Mix remaining ingredients; pour over meat.
Cover with foil; pierce foil in several places with sharp knife to vent.
Bake 3-1/2 to 4 hours or until meat is done (160F).
Let stand, covered, 10 min.
before slicing.
Serve with meat drippings.
pred:
To cook a delicious Beef Brisket dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, combine the sliced onions, beef brisket, and the can of condensed onion soup. Cook over medium heat until the onions are softened and the beef is browned on all sides.
3. Add the dry red wine and water to the pot, stirring to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 2 hours or until the beef is tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix the Heinz Tomato Ketchup, packed brown sugar, and the onion soup mix. Pour the mixture over the beef and onions in the pot.
5. Cover the pot with a lid and let the dish cook for another 1-2 hours or until the beef is tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Remove the beef from the pot and let it rest for a few minutes. Then, slice the beef and serve it over a bed of cooked noodles or rice.

Ingredients:
- 2 large onions, sliced
- 1 lb beef brisket (4 lb./1.8 kg)
- 1 can (10 fl oz/284 mL) condensed onion soup
- 1-1/4 cups dry red wine
- 1 cup water
- 1/2 cup Heinz Tomato Ketchup
- 1/2 cup packed brown sugar
- 1 env. (154 g) onion soup mix

[/INST]

gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Line 13x9-inch pan with foil, with ends of foil extending over sides.
Place butter in prepared pan; bake 5 min.
or until melted.
Crush 12 cookies; sprinkle over butter.
Top with coconut and milk.
Coarsely chop remaining cookies; sprinkle over milk.
Top with chocolate.
Bake 25 to 30 min.
or until lightly browned.
Cool completely Use foil handles to lift dessert from pan before cutting into bars.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sweetened condensed milk until smooth.
3. Add the coconut and chocolate chunks, and mix until well combined.
4. Press half of the peanut butter sandwich cookies into the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Spread the creamed mixture over the cookie layer.
6. Add the remaining peanut butter sandwich cookies on top of the creamed mixture.
7. Drizzle melted chocolate over the top of the cookies.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the edges are set and the center is slightly gooey.
9. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.

[/INST]

gt:
In a blender, combine 1st 6 ingredients and blend until berries are fully pureed and mixture is creamy.
Gently fold in 2 tbsp of chopped pecans and divide mixture among 8 small serving glasses approximately 4 ounces in size.
Top each serving with a few pieces of the remaining 1 tbsp of chopped pecans and chill for at least 1 hour or until ready to serve.
NOTES: The yield is 8 3-oz servings as a palate cleanser after a savory course of an elegant meal.
As a light dessert, I suggest 6 4-0z servings w/a sml berry, scattered choc shavings, a mint or a cookie to dress it up.
pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped strawberries, raspberry preserves, honey, and whipping cream. Mix until well combined.
2. Add the Baileys Irish Cream and brandy to the mixture, stirring gently to combine.
3. Fold in the chopped pecans, making sure they are evenly distributed throughout the mixture.
4. Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or until well-chilled.
5. Serve the Berry & Brandy Cream Palate Cleanser in small glasses, garnished with a sprig of mint if desired.

[/INST]

[/INST]

This Berry & Brandy Cream Palate Cleanser is a delicious and refreshing dessert that combines the sweetness of strawberries and raspberries with the richness of Baileys Irish Cream and brandy. The addition of pecans provides a crunchy texture and a touch of warmth to the dessert. The mint garnish adds a final touch of freshness and elegance to the presentation. This dessert is perfect for a special occasion or as a delightful treat for any gathering.

gt:
Put all ingredients in the blender and viola!
Easiest and very healthy smoothie!
pred:
1. In a blender, combine 1 cup of Old fashion oats, 1 tsp of Vanilla extract, and 1 tsp of sugar.
2. Add 14 frozen strawberries to the blender.
3. Add a ripe banana to the blender.
4. Pour 1 cup of milk into the blender.
5. Blend all the ingredients until smooth and creamy.
6. Taste the smoothie and adjust the sweetness if needed.
7. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

The essential ingredients for preparing a Strawberry Oat Smoothie are:
1 cup Old fashion oats
1 tsp Vanilla extract
1 tsp Sugar
14 Frozen strawberries
1 Banana
1 cup Milk (any kind)

These ingredients will provide a delicious and nutritious smoothie that combines the natural sweetness of the strawberries, the creaminess of the milk, and the rich flavor of the oats and vanilla.

gt:
Coat the bottom of a heat-resistant dish with the butter.
Leave the remaining butter as is in the center of the dish.
Break the egg into the dish!
Use a toothpick to poke the egg yolk 10 times.
If you don't do this, the egg yolk will explode when cooking, so it's necessary!
Place the cut wiener sausages around the egg and lightly sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Lightly cover with plastic wrap and microwave at 600 W for 1 minute.
Remove from the microwave and check the hardness, then microwave for another 20 seconds.
The time it takes to harden the egg will vary depending on the egg, the size of the dish, and the amount of wiener sausages, so first heat for 1 minute and then in 20 second intervals.
Once it has become cooked to your liking, spin the dish a little, and top with melted butter to finish.
pred:
1. Crack the egg into a microwave-safe bowl.
2. Add 5 grams of butter or margarine to the bowl.
3. Season the egg with salt and pepper.
4. Microwave the egg and butter mixture on high for 1 minute.
5. Carefully add the cooked sausages to the bowl.
6. Microwave the mixture for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the sausages are fully cooked.
7. Serve the Sloppy Egg & Wiener Sausages over a plate of rice or toast.

Enjoy your delicious and easy-to-prepare Microwave Sloppy Egg & Wiener Sausages!

gt:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Cook the bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain and cool to room temperature.
Combine tomatoes, bocconcini, olives, olive oil, basil, and oregano in a large bowl; toss to evenly coat.
Add pasta to tomato mixture and toss.
pred:
To make a delicious Pasta Fredda dish, follow these steps:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, and cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat. Add the cherry tomatoes and cook until they are slightly softened and begin to release their juices.
3. Add the bocconcini to the skillet, and cook until they are melted and slightly golden.
4. In a small bowl, mix the black olives, olive oil, and oregano leaves.
5. When the pasta is cooked, reserve 1 cup of the pasta cooking water, and then drain the pasta.
6. Return the pasta to the pot, and stir in the black olive mixture.
7. Add the reserved pasta cooking water, a pinch of salt, and the basil leaves. Stir to combine, and let the mixture simmer for a few minutes until the flavors are well-mixed.
8. Serve the Pasta Fredda immediately, and enjoy!

Ingredients:
1 (8 ounce) package farfalle (bow tie) pasta
20 cherry tomatoes, halved
7 ounces bocconcini (small balls of fresh mozzarella cheese)
3/4 cup black olives
2 tablespoons olive oil
6 fresh basil leaves
1 1/2 teaspoons fresh oregano leaves.

gt:
Mix all marinade ingredients and pour over chicken in a large bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least two hours, preferably overnight.
Cook chicken in a large pan over high heat until nearly cooked through, then transfer to a plate and set aside.
You'll want the chicken to finish cooking in the sauce.
Discard the remainer of the marinade.
Combine onion, garlic and ginger in a blender until smooth.
Heat the clarified butter in a medium saucepan, then pour in onion mixture.
Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes, stirring frequently.
If you want yours on the spicier side, throw in a whole red chili.
Add garam masala and tomatoes, lower heat slightly and cook until tomatoes cook down into the sauce, about 15 minutes.
Add chicken, and cook for another 15 minutes.
Add heavy cream, remove from heat, fish out the whole chili, taste for salt and allow to stand and thicken for 5-10 minutes.
Serve with basmati rice, chopped cilantro, yogurt and lime wedges.
pred:
[INST]To prepare the marinade, combine the yogurt, lime juice, garam masala, ginger, and salt in a bowl. Add the chicken cubes, onion, and garlic, and toss everything together until the chicken is evenly coated. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.

To cook the chicken, preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Heat the clarified butter or ghee in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the marinade has caramelized. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.

Add the onion and garlic to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the onion is softened. Add the tomatoes and cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until they start to release their juices.

To make the sauce, combine the heavy cream, garam masala, and crushed red chili in a small saucepan. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.

Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir everything together. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is heated through and the sauce has coated everything evenly.

Serve the Chicken Tikka Masala over rice or with your preferred side dish. Enjoy!

[/INST]

gt:
Butterfly the sardines.
Sprinkle on some sake to get rid of any gaminess.
Pat them dry gently, then season with salt, pepper and curry powder.
Using a butter knife, spread out the genovese sauce evenly on the bellies of the sardines.
Brush on a small amount of mayonnaise on the skin side (optional).
Please refer to Helpful Hints.
Coat them with panko by pressing them down a bit.
Bake in an oven to finish.
Serve with ground sea salt and pepper or Japanese Worcestershire-style sauce if you'd like.
Notes: My daughters like to eat these sardines with aurora sauce that you make with ketchup and mayonnaise.
Notes: Panko will often fall on the baking dish when cooking in the oven.
If that bothers you, please spread out a sheet of aluminum foil underneath the dish.
To improve the flavor, use panko made of bread crusts or roasted panko.

gt:
1.
Combine first 4 ingredients.2.
Sprinkle pork with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper; toss.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add 1 tablespoon canola oil; swirl.
Add pork, and cook for 3 minutes, browning on all sides.
Remove pork from pan; keep warm.3.
Heat pan over high heat, and add remaining 1 tablespoon canola oil, and swirl to coat.
Add onion, and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Add the bell peppers and jalapeno; stir-fry for 1 minute.
Return pork to pan, and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Stir in broth mixture, the remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and bring to a boil.

pred:

gt:
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir thoroughly.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients: 3/4 to 1 ounce green creme de menthe, 1 1/2 to 2 ounces vodka, and 3 or 4 ice cubes.
2. In a shaker, combine the green creme de menthe and vodka.

gt:
Unroll one of the fruit rollups.
Cut into 3 inch sections.
Peel the fruit roll off the paper and put back on.
It helps when rolling it up later.
Smoosh the coconut in a line down the fruit roll.
Starting at the edge and leaving the last 1/2" empty.
Place the pineapple about 1" in from the end of the fruit roll that you started the coconut at.
The diameter of the pineapple section should be about a 1/4" thick.
Start rolling the fruit roll around the pineapple and coconut.
Wet the empty end of the fruit roll with a little bit of water and press it onto the section of rolled up fruit roll.
I kind of smoosh the open ends to make it a bit compact.
pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. Spread the dried pineapple strips evenly across the prepared baking sheet.
4. In a small bowl, mix the shredded coconut and any desired seasonings (e.g., cinnamon, nutmeg, or vanilla extract).
5. Roll out the fruit roll-ups on a flat surface or a rolling pin to make them thinner.
6. Cut the rolled-out fruit roll-ups into 1/2-inch strips.
7. Arrange the fruit roll-up strips and coconut mixture in alternating layers on the prepared baking sheet.
8. Bake the fruit sushi for 10-12 minutes, or until the fruit roll-ups are soft and the coconut mixture is lightly toasted.
9. Remove the fruit sushi from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Carefully transfer the fruit sushi onto a serving plate, and enjoy!

This step-by-step procedure will help you create delicious and visually appealing Fruit Sushi using the provided ingredients.

gt:
Heat bacon for 30 seconds in the microwave between two pieces of paper towel to soak up excess grease
Spread honey mustard on tortilla then lay cheese on top of honey mustard, then add chicken, then add the bacon.

of the remaining sauce.

To prepare a delicious BBQ Glazed Pork Tenderloin with Apple Stuffing dish, follow these steps:

2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper, then place it on a baking sheet.
3. In a small bowl, mix the KRAFT Honey Spiced Pork Chop Barbecue Sauce with the butter or margarine.
4. Spread the sauce mixture evenly over the pork tenderloin, then place the baking sheet in the preheated oven.
5. Cook the pork tenderloin for about 1 hour or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C).
6. Remove the pork tenderloin from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
7. In a small bowl, mix the chopped onions and water.
8. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped red apples with the STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix for Chicken in the Canister.
9. Spread the apple mixture evenly over the pork tenderloin.
10. Return the baking sheet to the preheated oven and cook for an additional 15-20 minutes or until the apples are tender and the pork is cooked through.

[/INST]

This dish is a delicious combination of flavors and textures, with the tender pork tenderloin, juicy apples, and the savory barbecue sauce. The apple stuffing adds a unique twist to the dish, making it a delightful and satisfying meal.

gt:

gt:
Saute the lobster meat gently in butter until butter turns pink.
Add half and half slowly.
Heat over medium heat until hot.
Do not boil.
Serve with oyster crackers and enjoy!
pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including 1 pound cooked lobster meat, 1 cup butter, and 2 quarts half-and-half cream.
2. In a large pot, melt the butter over medium heat.
3. Add the lobster meat and cook until it is heated through and the flavors have melded together.
4. Pour in the half-and-half cream and stir to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a simmer, and then reduce the heat to low.
6. Allow the stew to cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally to ensure that the lobster does not stick to the bottom of the pot.
7. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Lobster Stew hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley or chopped chives, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Lobster Stew!

gt:
Heat the oven to 350 degrees F. Stir the flour, black pepper and paprika on a plate.
Coat the chicken with the flour mixture.
Heat the oil in a 12-inch oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and cook for 10 minutes or until well browned on all sides.
Remove the chicken from the skillet.
Pour off any fat.
Add the onions and potatoes to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the carrots, stock, lemon juice and oregano and heat to a boil.
Return the chicken to the skillet.
Cover the skillet.
Roast for 25 minutes.
Uncover the skillet.
Roast, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
Sprinkle with the thyme, if desired.
pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, pepper, paprika, and herbs.
3. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then coat it in the seasoned flour mixture.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. Add the onions and potatoes to the skillet and cook until the onions are softened, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the carrots, stock, lemon juice, and herbs to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
7. Return the chicken to the skillet and cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
8. Remove the chicken from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into pieces and serving.

gt:
Peel potatoes, cut them into large pieces (about 2-inch cubes), and place them in a large pot with heavily salted water and bring to a slow boil over medium-high heat.
While potatoes are cooking, cut butter into small cubes and set aside.
When potatoes are fork tender, drain well and return to pot; let sit for 5 minutes to dry out.
Transfer potatoes to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment.
With the mixer on low, add butter and cream until potatoes are smooth.
Stir in scallions, if using, and season generously with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
pred:

2. Wash the potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Place the potatoes in a large pot, cover them with cold water, and bring to a boil.
4. Reduce the heat to medium-low, and simmer the potatoes until they are tender, about 20-25 minutes.
5. Drain the potatoes, and return them to the pot.
6. Mash the potatoes with a fork or a potato masher until they reach your desired consistency.
7. In a small bowl, mix the heavy cream and scallions.
8. Add the cream mixture to the mashed potatoes, and stir to combine.
9. Season the potatoes with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Transfer the potatoes to a large baking dish, and drizzle with the melted butter.
11. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the edges.
12. Serve the Classic Mashed Potatoes Recipe hot, and enjoy!

[/INST]
